verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निमी॑ळे पु॒रोहि॑तं य॒ज्ञस्य॑ दे॒वमृ॒त्विज॑म् होता॑रं रत्न॒धात॑मम्
verses.transliteration: agním īḷe puróhitaṃ  yajñásya devám r̥tvíjam  hótāraṃ ratnadhā́tamam

translation.text: I Laud Agni, the chosen Priest, God, minister of sacrifice, The hotar, lavishest of wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निः पूर्वे॑भि॒र्ऋषि॑भि॒रीड्यो॒ नूत॑नैरु॒त स दे॒वाँ एह व॑क्षति
verses.transliteration: agníḥ pū́rvebhir ŕ̥ṣibhir  ī́ḍyo nū́tanair utá  sá devā́m̐ éhá vakṣati

translation.text: Worthy is Agni to be praised by living as by ancient seers. He shall bring hitherward the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निना॑ र॒यिम॑श्नव॒त्पोष॑मे॒व दि॒वेदि॑वे य॒शसं॑ वी॒रव॑त्तमम्
verses.transliteration: agnínā rayím aśnavat  póṣam evá divé-dive  yaśásaṃ vīrávattamam

translation.text: Through Agni man obtaineth wealth, yea, plenty waxing day by day, Most rich in heroes, glorious.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॒ यं य॒ज्ञम॑ध्व॒रं वि॒श्वतः॑ परि॒भूरसि॑ स इद्दे॒वेषु॑ गच्छति
verses.transliteration: ágne yáṃ yajñám adhvaráṃ  viśvátaḥ paribhū́r ási  sá íd devéṣu gachati

translation.text: Agni, the perfect sacrifice which thou encompassest about Verily goeth to the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निर्होता॑ क॒विक्र॑तुः स॒त्यश्चि॒त्रश्र॑वस्तमः दे॒वो दे॒वेभि॒रा ग॑मत्
verses.transliteration: agnír hótā kavíkratuḥ  satyáś citráśravastamaḥ  devó devébhir ā́ gamat

translation.text: May Agni, sapient-minded Priest, truthful, most gloriously great, The God, come hither with the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद॒ङ्ग दा॒शुषे॒ त्वमग्ने॑ भ॒द्रं क॑रि॒ष्यसि॑ तवेत्तत्स॒त्यम॑ङ्गिरः
verses.transliteration: yád aṅgá dāśúṣe tvám  ágne bhadráṃ kariṣyási  távét tát satyám aṅgiraḥ

translation.text: Whatever blessing, Agni, thou wilt grant unto thy worshipper, That, Angiras, is indeed thy truth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उप॑ त्वाग्ने दि॒वेदि॑वे॒ दोषा॑वस्तर्धि॒या व॒यम् नमो॒ भर॑न्त॒ एम॑सि
verses.transliteration: úpa tvāgne divé-dive  dóṣāvastar dhiyā́ vayám  námo bháranta émasi

translation.text: To thee, dispeller of the night, O Agni, day by day with prayer Bringing thee reverence, we come

verses.sanskrit_deva: राज॑न्तमध्व॒राणां॑ गो॒पामृ॒तस्य॒ दीदि॑विम् वर्ध॑मानं॒ स्वे दमे॑
verses.transliteration: rā́jantam adhvarā́ṇāṃ  gopā́m r̥tásya dī́divim  várdhamānaṃ své dáme

translation.text: Ruler of sacrifices, guard of Law eternal, radiant One, Increasing in thine own abode.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नः॑ पि॒तेव॑ सू॒नवेऽग्ने॑ सूपाय॒नो भ॑व सच॑स्वा नः स्व॒स्तये॑
verses.transliteration: sá naḥ pitéva sūnáve-  -ágne sūpāyanó bhava  sácasvā naḥ svastáye

translation.text: Be to us easy of approach, even as a father to his son: Agni, be with us for our weal.

suktas.deity: Vayu, Indra and Vayu, Mitra and Varuna

verses.sanskrit_deva: वाय॒वा या॑हि दर्शते॒मे सोमा॒ अरं॑कृताः तेषां॑ पाहि श्रु॒धी हव॑म्
verses.transliteration: vā́yav ā́ yāhi darśata-  -imé sómā áraṃkr̥tāḥ  téṣām pāhi śrudhī́ hávam

translation.text: BEAUTIFUL Vâyu, come, for thee these Soma drops have been prepared: Drink of them, hearken to our call.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वाय॑ उ॒क्थेभि॑र्जरन्ते॒ त्वामच्छा॑ जरि॒तारः॑ सु॒तसो॑मा अह॒र्विदः॑
verses.transliteration: vā́ya ukthébhir jarante  tvā́m áchā jaritā́raḥ  sutásomā aharvídaḥ

translation.text: Knowing the days, with Soma juice poured forth, the singers glorify Thee, Vâyu, with their hymns of praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वायो॒ तव॑ प्रपृञ्च॒ती धेना॑ जिगाति दा॒शुषे॑ उ॒रू॒ची सोम॑पीतये
verses.transliteration: vā́yo táva prapr̥ñcatī́  dhénā jigāti dāśúṣe  urūcī́ sómapītaye

translation.text: Vâyu, thy penetrating stream goes forth unto the worshipper, Far-spreading for the Soma draught.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॑वायू इ॒मे सु॒ता उप॒ प्रयो॑भि॒रा ग॑तम् इन्द॑वो वामु॒शन्ति॒ हि
verses.transliteration: índravāyū imé sutā́ḥ-  úpa práyobhir ā́ gatam  índavo vām uśánti hí

translation.text: These, Indra-Vâyu, have been shed; come for our offered dainties' sake: The drops are yearning for you both.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वाय॒विन्द्र॑श्च चेतथः सु॒तानां॑ वाजिनीवसू तावा या॑त॒मुप॑ द्र॒वत्
verses.transliteration: vā́yav índraś ca cetathaḥ  sutā́nāṃ vājinīvasū  tā́v ā́ yātam úpa dravát

translation.text: Well do ye mark libations, ye Vâyu and Indra, rich in spoil So come ye swiftly hitherward.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वाय॒विन्द्र॑श्च सुन्व॒त आ या॑त॒मुप॑ निष्कृ॒तम् म॒क्ष्वि१॒॑त्था धि॒या न॑रा
verses.transliteration: vā́yav índraś ca sunvatáḥ-  ā́ yātam úpa niṣkr̥tám  makṣv ìtthā́ dhiyā́ narā

translation.text: Vâyu and Indra, come to what the Soma. presser hath prepared: Soon, Heroes, thus I make my prayer.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मि॒त्रं हु॑वे पू॒तद॑क्षं॒ वरु॑णं च रि॒शाद॑सम् धियं॑ घृ॒ताचीं॒ साध॑न्ता
verses.transliteration: mitráṃ huve pūtádakṣaṃ  váruṇaṃ ca riśā́dasam  dhíyaṃ ghr̥tā́cīṃ sā́dhantā

translation.text: Mitra, of holy strength, I call, and foe-destroying Varuṇa, Who make the oil-fed rite complete.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऋ॒तेन॑ मित्रावरुणावृतावृधावृतस्पृशा क्रतुं॑ बृ॒हन्त॑माशाथे
verses.transliteration: r̥téna mitrāvaruṇāv  r̥tāvr̥dhāv r̥taspr̥śā  krátum br̥hántam āśāthe

translation.text: Mitra and Varuṇa, through Law, lovers and cherishers of Law, Have ye obtained your might power

verses.sanskrit_deva: क॒वी नो॑ मि॒त्रावरु॑णा तुविजा॒ता उ॑रु॒क्षया॑ दक्षं॑ दधाते अ॒पस॑म्
verses.transliteration: kavī́ no mitrā́váruṇā  tuvijātā́ urukṣáyā  dákṣaṃ dadhāte apásam

translation.text: Our Sages, Mitra-Varuṇa, wide dominion, strong by birth, Vouchsafe us strength that worketh well.

suktas.deity: Asvins, Indra, All the Gods and Sarasvati

verses.sanskrit_deva: अश्वि॑ना॒ यज्व॑री॒रिषो॒ द्रव॑त्पाणी॒ शुभ॑स्पती पुरु॑भुजा चन॒स्यत॑म्
verses.transliteration: áśvinā yájvarīr íṣo  drávatpāṇī śúbhas patī  púrubhujā canasyátam

translation.text: YE Aṣvins, rich in treasure, Lords of splendour, having nimble hands, Accept the sacrificial food.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अश्वि॑ना॒ पुरु॑दंससा॒ नरा॒ शवी॑रया धि॒या धिष्ण्या॒ वन॑तं॒ गिरः॑
verses.transliteration: áśvinā púrudaṃsasā  nárā śávīrayā dhiyā́  dhíṣṇyā vánataṃ gíraḥ

translation.text: Ye Aṣvins, rich in wondrous deeds, ye heroes worthy of our praise, Accept our songs with mighty thought.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दस्रा॑ यु॒वाक॑वः सु॒ता नास॑त्या वृ॒क्तब॑र्हिषः आ या॑तं रुद्रवर्तनी
verses.transliteration: dásrā yuvā́kavaḥ sutā́ḥ-  nā́satyā vr̥ktábarhiṣaḥ  ā́ yātaṃ rudravartanī

translation.text: Nisatyas, wonder-workers, yours arc these libations with clipt grass: Come ye whose paths are red with flame.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रा या॑हि चित्रभानो सु॒ता इ॒मे त्वा॒यवः॑ अण्वी॑भि॒स्तना॑ पू॒तासः॑
verses.transliteration: índrā́ yāhi citrabhāno  sutā́ imé tvāyávaḥ  áṇvībhis tánā pūtā́saḥ

translation.text: O Indra marvellously bright, come, these libations long for thee, Thus by fine fingers purified.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रा या॑हि धि॒येषि॒तो विप्र॑जूतः सु॒ताव॑तः उप॒ ब्रह्मा॑णि वा॒घतः॑
verses.transliteration: índrā́ yāhi dhiyéṣitó  víprajūtaḥ sutā́vataḥ  úpa bráhmāṇi vāghátaḥ

translation.text: Urged by the holy singer, sped by song, come, Indra, to the prayers, Of the libation-pouring priest.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रा या॑हि॒ तूतु॑जान॒ उप॒ ब्रह्मा॑णि हरिवः सु॒ते द॑धिष्व न॒श्चनः॑
verses.transliteration: índrā́ yāhi tū́tujānaḥ-  úpa bráhmāṇi harivaḥ  suté dadhiṣva naś cánaḥ

translation.text: Approach, O Indra, hasting thee, Lord of Bay Horses, to the prayers. In our libation take delight.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ओमा॑सश्चर्षणीधृतो॒ विश्वे॑ देवास॒ आ ग॑त दा॒श्वांसो॑ दा॒शुषः॑ सु॒तम्
verses.transliteration: ómāsaś carṣaṇīdhr̥to  víśve devāsa ā́ gata  dāśvā́ṃso dāśúṣaḥ sutám

translation.text: Ye Viṣvedevas, who protect, reward, and cherish men, approach Your worshipper's drink-offering.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वे॑ दे॒वासो॑ अ॒प्तुरः॑ सु॒तमा ग॑न्त॒ तूर्ण॑यः उ॒स्रा इ॑व॒ स्वस॑राणि
verses.transliteration: víśve devā́so aptúraḥ  sutám ā́ ganta tū́rṇayaḥ  usrā́ iva svásarāṇi

translation.text: Ye Viṣvedevas, swift at work, come hither quickly to the draught, As milch-kine hasten to their stalls.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वे॑ दे॒वासो॑ अ॒स्रिध॒ एहि॑मायासो अ॒द्रुहः॑ मेधं॑ जुषन्त॒ वह्न॑यः
verses.transliteration: víśve devā́so asrídhaḥ-  éhimāyāso adrúhaḥ  médhaṃ juṣanta váhnayaḥ

translation.text: The Viṣvedevas, changing shape like serpents, fearless, void of guile, Bearers, accept the sacred draught

verses.sanskrit_deva: पा॒व॒का नः॒ सर॑स्वती॒ वाजे॑भिर्वा॒जिनी॑वती य॒ज्ञं व॑ष्टु धि॒याव॑सुः
verses.transliteration: pāvakā́ naḥ sárasvatī  vā́jebhir vājínīvatī  yajñáṃ vaṣṭu dhiyā́vasuḥ

translation.text: Wealthy in spoil, enriched with hymns, may bright Sarsavad desire, With eager love, our sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: चो॒द॒यि॒त्री सू॒नृता॑नां॒ चेत॑न्ती सुमती॒नाम् य॒ज्ञं द॑धे॒ सर॑स्वती
verses.transliteration: codayitrī́ sūnŕ̥tānāṃ  cétantī sumatīnā́m  yajñáṃ dadhe sárasvatī

translation.text: Inciter of all pleasant songs, inspirer o all gracious thought, Sarasvatî accept our rite

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒हो अर्णः॒ सर॑स्वती॒ प्र चे॑तयति के॒तुना॑ धियो॒ विश्वा॒ वि रा॑जति
verses.transliteration: mahó árṇaḥ sárasvatī  prá cetayati ketúnā  dhíyo víśvā ví rājati

translation.text: Sarasvatî, the mighty flood,– she with be light illuminates, She brightens every pious thought.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒रू॒प॒कृ॒त्नुमू॒तये॑ सु॒दुघा॑मिव गो॒दुहे॑ जु॒हू॒मसि॒ द्यवि॑द्यवि
verses.transliteration: surūpakr̥tnúm ūtáye  sudúghām iva godúhe  juhūmási dyávi-dyavi

translation.text: As a good cow to him who milks, we call the doer of fair deeds, To our assistance day by day.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उप॑ नः॒ सव॒ना ग॑हि॒ सोम॑स्य सोमपाः पिब गो॒दा इद्रे॒वतो॒ मदः॑
verses.transliteration: úpa naḥ sávanā́ gahi  sómasya somapāḥ piba  godā́ íd reváto mádaḥ

translation.text: Come thou to our libations, drink of Soma; Soma-drinker thou! The rich One's rapture giveth kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अथा॑ ते॒ अन्त॑मानां वि॒द्याम॑ सुमती॒नाम् मा नो॒ अति॑ ख्य॒ आ ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: áthā te ántamānāṃ  vidyā́ma sumatīnā́m  mā́ no áti khya ā́ gahi

translation.text: So may we be acquainted with thine innermost benevolence: Neglect us not, come hitherward.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परे॑हि॒ विग्र॒मस्तृ॑त॒मिन्द्रं॑ पृच्छा विप॒श्चित॑म् यस्ते॒ सखि॑भ्य॒ आ वर॑म्
verses.transliteration: párehi vígram ástr̥tam  índram pr̥chā vipaścítam  yás te sákhibhya ā́ váram

translation.text: Go to the wise unconquered One, ask thou of Indra, skilled in song, Him who is better than thy friends.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त ब्रु॑वन्तु नो॒ निदो॒ निर॒न्यत॑श्चिदारत दधा॑ना॒ इन्द्र॒ इद्दुवः॑
verses.transliteration: utá bruvantu no nído  nír anyátaś cid ārata  dádhānā índra íd dúvaḥ

translation.text: Whether the men who mock us say, Depart unto another place, Ye who serve Indra and none else;

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त नः॑ सु॒भगाँ॑ अ॒रिर्वो॒चेयु॑र्दस्म कृ॒ष्टयः॑ स्यामेदिन्द्र॑स्य॒ शर्म॑णि
verses.transliteration: utá naḥ subhágām̐ arír  vocéyur dasma kr̥ṣṭáyaḥ  syā́méd índrasya śármaṇi

translation.text: Or whether, God of wondrous deeds, all our true people call us blest, Still may we dwell in Indra's care.

verses.sanskrit_deva: एमा॒शुमा॒शवे॑ भर यज्ञ॒श्रियं॑ नृ॒माद॑नम् प॒त॒यन्म॑न्द॒यत्स॑खम्
verses.transliteration: ém āśúm āśáve bhara  yajñaśríyaṃ nr̥mā́danam  patayán mandayátsakham

translation.text: Unto the swift One bring the swift, man-cheering, grace of sacrifice, That to the Friend gives wings and joy.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्य पी॒त्वा श॑तक्रतो घ॒नो वृ॒त्राणा॑मभवः प्रावो॒ वाजे॑षु वा॒जिन॑म्
verses.transliteration: asyá pītvā́ śatakrato  ghanó vr̥trā́ṇām abhavaḥ  prā́vo vā́jeṣu vājínam

translation.text: Thou, Ṣatakratu, drankest this and wast the Vr̥itras' slayer; thou Helpest the warrior in the fray.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं त्वा॒ वाजे॑षु वा॒जिनं॑ वा॒जया॑मः शतक्रतो धना॑नामिन्द्र सा॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: táṃ tvā vā́jeṣu vājínaṃ  vājáyāmaḥ śatakrato  dhánānām indra sātáye

translation.text: We strengthen, Ṣatakratu, thee, yea, thee the powerful in fight, That, Indra, we may win us wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो रा॒यो॒३॒॑ऽवनि॑र्म॒हान्त्सु॑पा॒रः सु॑न्व॒तः सखा॑ तस्मा॒ इन्द्रा॑य गायत
verses.transliteration: yó rāyò 'vánir mahā́n  supāráḥ sunvatáḥ sákhā  tásmā índrāya gāyata

translation.text: To him the mighty stream of wealth, prompt friend ot'him who pours the juice, yea, to this Indra sing your song.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ त्वेता॒ नि षी॑द॒तेन्द्र॑म॒भि प्र गा॑यत सखा॑यः॒ स्तोम॑वाहसः
verses.transliteration: ā́ tv étā ní ṣīdatá-  -índram abhí prá gāyata  sákhāya stómavāhasaḥ

translation.text: O COME ye hither, sit ye down: to Indra sing ye forth, your song, companions, bringing hymns of praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒रू॒तमं॑ पुरू॒णामीशा॑नं॒ वार्या॑णाम् इन्द्रं॒ सोमे॒ सचा॑ सु॒ते
verses.transliteration: purūtámam purūṇā́m  ī́śānaṃ vā́ryāṇām  índraṃ sóme sácā suté

translation.text: To him the richest of the rich, the Lord of treasures excellent, Indra, wi th Soma juice outpoured.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स घा॑ नो॒ योग॒ आ भु॑व॒त्स रा॒ये स पुरं॑ध्याम् गम॒द्वाजे॑भि॒रा स नः॑
verses.transliteration: sá ghā no yóga ā́ bhuvat  sá rāyé sá púraṃdhyām  gámad vā́jebhir ā́ sá naḥ

translation.text: May he stand by us in our need and in abundance for our wealth: May he come nigh us with his strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्य॑ सं॒स्थे न वृ॒ण्वते॒ हरी॑ स॒मत्सु॒ शत्र॑वः तस्मा॒ इन्द्रा॑य गायत
verses.transliteration: yásya saṃsthé ná vr̥ṇváte  hárī samátsu śátravaḥ  tásmā índrāya gāyata

translation.text: Whose pair of tawny horses yoked in battles foemen challenge not: To him, to Indra sing your song.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒त॒पाव्ने॑ सु॒ता इ॒मे शुच॑यो यन्ति वी॒तये॑ सोमा॑सो॒ दध्या॑शिरः
verses.transliteration: sutapā́vne sutā́ imé  śúcayo yanti vītáye  sómāso dádhyāśiraḥ

translation.text: Nigh to the Soma-drinker come, for his enjoyment, these pure drops, The Somas mingled with the curd.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं सु॒तस्य॑ पी॒तये॑ स॒द्यो वृ॒द्धो अ॑जायथाः इन्द्र॒ ज्यैष्ठ्या॑य सुक्रतो
verses.transliteration: tváṃ sutásya pītáye  sadyó vr̥ddhó ajāyathāḥ  índra jyaíṣṭhyāya sukrato

translation.text: Thou, grown at once to perfect strength, wast born to drink the Soma juice, Strong Indra, for preeminence.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ त्वा॑ विशन्त्वा॒शवः॒ सोमा॑स इन्द्र गिर्वणः शं ते॑ सन्तु॒ प्रचे॑तसे
verses.transliteration: ā́ tvā viśantv āśávaḥ  sómāsa indra girvaṇaḥ  śáṃ te santu prácetase

translation.text: O Indra, lover of the song, may these quick Somas enter thee: May they bring bliss to thee the Sage.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वां स्तोमा॑ अवीवृध॒न्त्वामु॒क्था श॑तक्रतो त्वां व॑र्धन्तु नो॒ गिरः॑
verses.transliteration: tvā́ṃ stómā avīvr̥dhan  tvā́m ukthā́ śatakrato  tvā́ṃ vardhantu no gíraḥ

translation.text: Our chants of praise have strengthened thee, O Ṣatakratu, and our lauds So strengthen thee the songs we sing.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अक्षि॑तोतिः सनेदि॒मं वाज॒मिन्द्रः॑ सह॒स्रिण॑म् यस्मि॒न्विश्वा॑नि॒ पौंस्या॑
verses.transliteration: ákṣitotiḥ saned imáṃ  vā́jam índraḥ sahasríṇam  yásmin víśvāni paúṃsyā

translation.text: Indra, whose succour never fails, accept these viands thousandfold, Wherein all manly powers abide.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा नो॒ मर्ता॑ अ॒भि द्रु॑हन्त॒नूना॑मिन्द्र गिर्वणः ईशा॑नो यवया व॒धम्
verses.transliteration: mā́ no mártā abhí druhan  tanū́nām indra girvaṇaḥ  ī́śāno yavayā vadhám

translation.text: O Indra, thou who lovest song, let no man hurt our bodies, keep Slaughter far from us, for thou canst.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यु॒ञ्जन्ति॑ ब्र॒ध्नम॑रु॒षं चर॑न्तं॒ परि॑ त॒स्थुषः॑ रोच॑न्ते रोच॒ना दि॒वि
verses.transliteration: yuñjánti bradhnám aruṣáṃ  cárantam pári tasthúṣaḥ  rócante rocanā́ diví

translation.text: They who stand round him as he moves harness the bright, the ruddy Steed The lights are shining in the sky.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यु॒ञ्जन्त्य॑स्य॒ काम्या॒ हरी॒ विप॑क्षसा॒ रथे॑ शोणा॑ धृ॒ष्णू नृ॒वाह॑सा
verses.transliteration: yuñjánty asya kā́myā  hárī vípakṣasā ráthe  śóṇā dhr̥ṣṇū́ nr̥vā́hasā

translation.text: On both sides to the car they yoke the two bay coursers dear to him, Bold, tawny, bearers of the Chief.

verses.sanskrit_deva: के॒तुं कृ॒ण्वन्न॑के॒तवे॒ पेशो॑ मर्या अपे॒शसे॑ समु॒षद्भि॑रजायथाः
verses.transliteration: ketúṃ kr̥ṇvánn aketáve  péśo maryā apeśáse  sám uṣádbhir ajāyathāḥ

translation.text: Thou, making light where no light was, and form, O men: where form was not, Wast born together with the Dawns.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आदह॑ स्व॒धामनु॒ पुन॑र्गर्भ॒त्वमे॑रि॒रे दधा॑ना॒ नाम॑ य॒ज्ञिय॑म्
verses.transliteration: ā́d áha svadhā́m ánu  púnar garbhatvám eriré  dádhānā nā́ma yajñíyam

translation.text: Thereafter they, as is their wont, threw off the state of' babes unborn, Assuming sacrificial names.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वी॒ळु चि॑दारुज॒त्नुभि॒र्गुहा॑ चिदिन्द्र॒ वह्नि॑भिः अवि॑न्द उ॒स्रिया॒ अनु॑
verses.transliteration: vīḷú cid ārujatnúbhir  gúhā cid indra váhnibhiḥ  ávinda usríyā ánu

translation.text: Thou, Indra, with the Tempest-Gods, the breakers down of what is firm ' Foundest the kine even in the cave.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दे॒व॒यन्तो॒ यथा॑ म॒तिमच्छा॑ वि॒दद्व॑सुं॒ गिरः॑ म॒हाम॑नूषत श्रु॒तम्
verses.transliteration: devayánto yáthā matím  áchā vidádvasuṃ gíraḥ  mahā́m anūṣata śrutám

translation.text: Worshipping even as they list, singers laud him who findeth wealth, The far-renowned, the mighty One.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रे॑ण॒ सं हि दृक्ष॑से संजग्मा॒नो अबि॑भ्युषा म॒न्दू स॑मा॒नव॑र्चसा
verses.transliteration: índreṇa sáṃ hí dŕ̥kṣase  saṃjagmānó ábibhyuṣā  mandū́ samānávarcasā

translation.text: Mayest thou verily be seen coming by fearless Indra's side: Both joyous, equal in your sheen.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒न॒व॒द्यैर॒भिद्यु॑भिर्म॒खः सह॑स्वदर्चति ग॒णैरिन्द्र॑स्य॒ काम्यैः॑
verses.transliteration: anavadyaír abhídyubhir  makháḥ sáhasvad arcati  gaṇaír índrasya kā́myaiḥ

translation.text: With Indra's well beloved hosts, the blameless, hastening to heaven, The sacrificer cries aloud.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अतः॑ परिज्म॒न्ना ग॑हि दि॒वो वा॑ रोच॒नादधि॑ सम॑स्मिन्नृञ्जते॒ गिरः॑
verses.transliteration: átaḥ parijmann ā́ gahi  divó vā rocanā́d ádhi  sám asminn r̥ñjate gíraḥ

translation.text: Come from this place, O Wanderer, or downward from the light of heaven: Our songs of praise all yearn for this.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒तो वा॑ सा॒तिमीम॑हे दि॒वो वा॒ पार्थि॑वा॒दधि॑ इन्द्रं॑ म॒हो वा॒ रज॑सः
verses.transliteration: itó vā sātím ī́mahe  divó vā pā́rthivād ádhi  índram mahó vā rájasaḥ

translation.text: Indra we seek to give us help, from here, from heaven above the earth, Or from the spacious firmament.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॒मिद्गा॒थिनो॑ बृ॒हदिन्द्र॑म॒र्केभि॑र॒र्किणः॑ इन्द्रं॒ वाणी॑रनूषत
verses.transliteration: índram íd gāthíno br̥hád  índram arkébhir arkíṇaḥ  índraṃ vā́ṇīr anūṣata

translation.text: INDRA the singers with high praise, Indra reciters with their lauds, Indra the choirs have glorified.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॒ इद्धर्योः॒ सचा॒ सम्मि॑श्ल॒ आ व॑चो॒युजा॑ इन्द्रो॑ व॒ज्री हि॑र॒ण्ययः॑
verses.transliteration: índra íd dháryoḥ sácā  sámmiśla ā́ vacoyújā  índro vajrī́ hiraṇyáyaḥ

translation.text: Indra hath ever close to him his two bay steeds and word-yoked car, Indra the golden, thunder-armed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रो॑ दी॒र्घाय॒ चक्ष॑स॒ आ सूर्यं॑ रोहयद्दि॒वि वि गोभि॒रद्रि॑मैरयत्
verses.transliteration: índro dīrghā́ya cákṣase-  ā́ sū́ryaṃ rohayad diví  ví góbhir ádrim airayat

translation.text: Indra hath raised the Sun on high in heaven, that he may see afar: He burst the mountain for the kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॒ वाजे॑षु नोऽव स॒हस्र॑प्रधनेषु च उ॒ग्र उ॒ग्राभि॑रू॒तिभिः॑
verses.transliteration: índra vā́jeṣu no 'va  sahásrapradhaneṣu ca  ugrá ugrā́bhir ūtíbhiḥ

translation.text: Help us, O Indra, in the frays, yea, frays, where thousand spoils are gained, With awful aids, O awful One.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रं॑ व॒यं म॑हाध॒न इन्द्र॒मर्भे॑ हवामहे युजं॑ वृ॒त्रेषु॑ व॒ज्रिण॑म्
verses.transliteration: índraṃ vayám mahādhané  índram árbhe havāmahe  yújaṃ vr̥tréṣu vajríṇam

translation.text: In mighty battle we invoke Indra, Indra in lesser fight, The Friend who bends his bolt at fiends.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॑ वृषन्न॒मुं च॒रुं सत्रा॑दाव॒न्नपा॑ वृधि अ॒स्मभ्य॒मप्र॑तिष्कुतः
verses.transliteration: sá no vr̥ṣann amúṃ carúṃ  sátrādāvann ápā vr̥dhi  asmábhyam ápratiṣkutaḥ

translation.text: Unclose, our manly Hero, thou for ever bounteous, yonder cloud, For us, thou irresistible.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तु॒ञ्जेतु॑ञ्जे॒ य उत्त॑रे॒ स्तोमा॒ इन्द्र॑स्य व॒ज्रिणः॑ न वि॑न्धे अस्य सुष्टु॒तिम्
verses.transliteration: tuñjé-tuñje yá úttare  stómā índrasya vajríṇaḥ  ná vindhe asya suṣṭutím

translation.text: Still higher, at each strain of mine, thunder-armed Indra's praises rise: I find no laud worthy of him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृषा॑ यू॒थेव॒ वंस॑गः कृ॒ष्टीरि॑य॒र्त्योज॑सा ईशा॑नो॒ अप्र॑तिष्कुतः
verses.transliteration: vŕ̥ṣā yūthéva váṃsagaḥ  kr̥ṣṭī́r iyarty ójasā  ī́śāno ápratiṣkutaḥ

translation.text: Even as the bull drives on the herds, he drives the people with his might, The Ruler irresistible:

verses.sanskrit_deva: य एक॑श्चर्षणी॒नां वसू॑नामिर॒ज्यति॑ इन्द्रः॒ पञ्च॑ क्षिती॒नाम्
verses.transliteration: yá ékaś carṣaṇīnā́ṃ  vásūnām irajyáti  índraḥ páñca kṣitīnā́m

translation.text: Indra who rules with single sway men, riches, and the fivefold race Of those who dwell upon the earth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रं॑ वो वि॒श्वत॒स्परि॒ हवा॑महे॒ जने॑भ्यः अ॒स्माक॑मस्तु॒ केव॑लः
verses.transliteration: índraṃ vo viśvátas pári  hávāmahe jánebhyaḥ  asmā́kam astu kévalaḥ

translation.text: For your sake from each side we call Indra away from other men: Ours, and none others', may he be.

verses.sanskrit_deva: एन्द्र॑ सान॒सिं र॒यिं स॒जित्वा॑नं सदा॒सह॑म् वर्षि॑ष्ठमू॒तये॑ भर
verses.transliteration: éndra sānasíṃ rayíṃ  sajítvānaṃ sadāsáham  várṣiṣṭham ūtáye bhara

translation.text: INDRA, bring wealth that gives delight, the victor's ever-conquering wealth, Most excellent, to be our aid;

verses.sanskrit_deva: नि येन॑ मुष्टिह॒त्यया॒ नि वृ॒त्रा रु॒णधा॑महै त्वोता॑सो॒ न्यर्व॑ता
verses.transliteration: ní yéna muṣṭihatyáyā  ní vr̥trā́ ruṇádhāmahai  tvótāso ny árvatā

translation.text: By means of which we may repel our foes in battle hand to hand, By thee assisted with the car.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॒ त्वोता॑स॒ आ व॒यं वज्रं॑ घ॒ना द॑दीमहि जये॑म॒ सं यु॒धि स्पृधः॑
verses.transliteration: índra tvótāsa ā́ vayáṃ  vájraṃ ghanā́ dadīmahi  jáyema sáṃ yudhí spŕ̥dhaḥ

translation.text: Aided by thee, the thunder-armed, Indra, may we lift up the bolt, And conquer all our foes in fight.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व॒यं शूरे॑भि॒रस्तृ॑भि॒रिन्द्र॒ त्वया॑ यु॒जा व॒यम् सा॒स॒ह्याम॑ पृतन्य॒तः
verses.transliteration: vayáṃ śū́rebhir ástr̥bhir  índra tváyā yujā́ vayám  sāsahyā́ma pr̥tanyatáḥ

translation.text: With thee, O India, for ally with missile-darting heroes, may We conquer our embattled foes.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒हाँ इन्द्रः॑ प॒रश्च॒ नु म॑हि॒त्वम॑स्तु व॒ज्रिणे॑ द्यौर्न प्र॑थि॒ना शवः॑
verses.transliteration: mahā́m̐ índraḥ paráś ca nú  mahitvám astu vajríṇe  dyaúr ná prathinā́ śávaḥ

translation.text: Mighty is Indra, yea supreme; greatness be his, the Thunderer: Wide as the heaven extends his power

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒मो॒हे वा॒ य आश॑त॒ नर॑स्तो॒कस्य॒ सनि॑तौ विप्रा॑सो वा धिया॒यवः॑
verses.transliteration: samohé vā yá ā́śata  náras tokásya sánitau  víprāso vā dhiyāyávaḥ

translation.text: Which aideth those to win them sons, who come as heroes to the fight, Or singers loving holy thoughts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यः कु॒क्षिः सो॑म॒पात॑मः समु॒द्र इ॑व॒ पिन्व॑ते उ॒र्वीरापो॒ न का॒कुदः॑
verses.transliteration: yáḥ kukṣíḥ somapā́tamaḥ  samudrá iva pínvate  urvī́r ā́po ná kākúdaḥ

translation.text: His belly, drinking deepest draughts of Soma, like an ocean swells, Like wide streams from the cope of heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒वा ह्य॑स्य सू॒नृता॑ विर॒प्शी गोम॑ती म॒ही प॒क्वा शाखा॒ न दा॒शुषे॑
verses.transliteration: evā́ hy àsya sūnŕ̥tā  virapśī́ gómatī mahī́  pakvā́ śā́khā ná dāśúṣe

translation.text: So also is his excellence, great, vigorous, rich in cattle, like A ripe branch to the worshipper.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒वा हि ते॒ विभू॑तय ऊ॒तय॑ इन्द्र॒ माव॑ते स॒द्यश्चि॒त्सन्ति॑ दा॒शुषे॑
verses.transliteration: evā́ hí te víbhūtayaḥ-  ūtáya indra mā́vate  sadyáś cit sánti dāśúṣe

translation.text: For verily thy mighty powers, Indra, are saving helps at once Unto a worshipper like me.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒वा ह्य॑स्य॒ काम्या॒ स्तोम॑ उ॒क्थं च॒ शंस्या॑ इन्द्रा॑य॒ सोम॑पीतये
verses.transliteration: evā́ hy àsya kā́myā  stóma uktháṃ ca śáṃsyā  índrāya sómapītaye

translation.text: So are his lovely gifts; let lauds and praises be to Indra sung, That he may drink the Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रेहि॒ मत्स्यन्ध॑सो॒ विश्वे॑भिः सोम॒पर्व॑भिः म॒हाँ अ॑भि॒ष्टिरोज॑सा
verses.transliteration: índréhi mátsy ándhaso  víśvebhiḥ somapárvabhiḥ  mahā́m̐ abhiṣṭír ójasā

translation.text: COME, Indra, and delight thee with the juice at all the Soma feasts, Protector, mighty in thy strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: एमे॑नं सृजता सु॒ते म॒न्दिमिन्द्रा॑य म॒न्दिने॑ चक्रिं॒ विश्वा॑नि॒ चक्र॑ये
verses.transliteration: ém enaṃ sr̥jatā suté  mandím índrāya mandíne  cákriṃ víśvāni cákraye

translation.text: To Indra pour ye forth thejuice, the active gladdening juice to him Ile gladdening, oinnific God.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मत्स्वा॑ सुशिप्र म॒न्दिभिः॒ स्तोमे॑भिर्विश्वचर्षणे सचै॒षु सव॑ने॒ष्वा
verses.transliteration: mátsvā suśipra mandíbhiḥ-  stómebhir viśvacarṣaṇe  sácaiṣú sávaneṣv ā́

translation.text: O Lord of all men, fair of cheek, rejoice thee in the gladdening lauds, Present at these drink-offerings.

verses.sanskrit_deva: असृ॑ग्रमिन्द्र ते॒ गिरः॒ प्रति॒ त्वामुद॑हासत अजो॑षा वृष॒भं पति॑म्
verses.transliteration: ásr̥gram indra te gíraḥ  práti tvā́m úd ahāsata  ájoṣā vr̥ṣabhám pátim

translation.text: Songs have outpoured themselves to thee, Indra, the strong, the guardian Lord, And raised themselves unsatisfied.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सं चो॑दय चि॒त्रम॒र्वाग्राध॑ इन्द्र॒ वरे॑ण्यम् अस॒दित्ते॑ वि॒भु प्र॒भु
verses.transliteration: sáṃ codaya citrám arvā́g  rā́dha indra váreṇyam  ásad ít te vibhú prabhú

translation.text: Send to us bounty manifold, O Indra, worthy of' our wish, For power supreme is only thine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्मान्त्सु तत्र॑ चोद॒येन्द्र॑ रा॒ये रभ॑स्वतः तुवि॑द्युम्न॒ यश॑स्वतः
verses.transliteration: asmā́n sú tátra codaya-  -índra rāyé rábhasvataḥ  túvidyumna yáśasvataḥ

translation.text: O Indra, stimulate thereto us emulously fain for wealth, And glorious, O most splendid One.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सं गोम॑दिन्द्र॒ वाज॑वद॒स्मे पृ॒थु श्रवो॑ बृ॒हत् वि॒श्वायु॑र्धे॒ह्यक्षि॑तम्
verses.transliteration: sáṃ gómad indra vā́javad  asmé pr̥thú śrávo br̥hát  viśvā́yur dhehy ákṣitam

translation.text: Give, Indra, wide and lofty fame, wealthy in cattle and in strength, Lasting our life-time, failing not.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्मे धे॑हि॒ श्रवो॑ बृ॒हद्द्यु॒म्नं स॑हस्र॒सात॑मम् इन्द्र॒ ता र॒थिनी॒रिषः॑
verses.transliteration: asmé dhehi śrávo br̥hád  dyumnáṃ sahasrasā́tamam  índra tā́ rathínīr íṣaḥ

translation.text: Grant us high fame, O Indra, grant riches bestowing thousands, those Fair fruits of earth borne home in wains.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वसो॒रिन्द्रं॒ वसु॑पतिं गी॒र्भिर्गृ॒णन्त॑ ऋ॒ग्मिय॑म् होम॒ गन्ता॑रमू॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: vásor índraṃ vásupatiṃ  gīrbhír gr̥ṇánta r̥gmíyam  hóma gántāram ūtáye

translation.text: Praising with songs the praise-worthy who cometh to our aid, we call Indra, the Treasure-Lord of wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒तेसु॑ते॒ न्यो॑कसे बृ॒हद्बृ॑ह॒त एद॒रिः इन्द्रा॑य शू॒षम॑र्चति
verses.transliteration: suté-sute nyòkase  br̥hád br̥hatá éd aríḥ  índrāya śūṣám arcati

translation.text: To lofty Indra, dweller by each libation, the pious man Sings forth aloud a strengthening hymn.

verses.sanskrit_deva: गाय॑न्ति त्वा गाय॒त्रिणोऽर्च॑न्त्य॒र्कम॒र्किणः॑ ब्र॒ह्माण॑स्त्वा शतक्रत॒ उद्वं॒शमि॑व येमिरे
verses.transliteration: gā́yanti tvā gāyatríṇaḥ-  -árcanty arkám arkíṇaḥ  brahmā́ṇas tvā śatakrato-  úd vaṃśám iva yemire

translation.text: THE chanters hymn thee, they who say the word of praise magnify thee. The priests have raised thee up on high, O Ṣatakratu, like a pole.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यत्सानोः॒ सानु॒मारु॑ह॒द्भूर्यस्प॑ष्ट॒ कर्त्व॑म् तदिन्द्रो॒ अर्थं॑ चेतति यू॒थेन॑ वृ॒ष्णिरे॑जति
verses.transliteration: yát sā́noḥ sā́num ā́ruhad  bhū́ry áspaṣṭa kártvam  tád índro árthaṃ cetati  yūthéna vr̥ṣṇír ejati

translation.text: As up he clomb from ridge to ridge and looked upon the toilsome task, Indra observes this wish of his, and the Rain hastens with his troop.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यु॒क्ष्वा हि के॒शिना॒ हरी॒ वृष॑णा कक्ष्य॒प्रा अथा॑ न इन्द्र सोमपा गि॒रामुप॑श्रुतिं चर
verses.transliteration: yukṣvā́ hí keśínā hárī  vŕ̥ṣaṇā kakṣyaprā́  áthā na indra somapāḥ-  girā́m úpaśrutiṃ cara

translation.text: Harness thy pair of strong bay steeds, long-maned, whose bodies fill the girths, And, Indra, Soma-drinker, come to listen to our songs of praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: एहि॒ स्तोमाँ॑ अ॒भि स्व॑रा॒भि गृ॑णी॒ह्या रु॑व ब्रह्म॑ च नो वसो॒ सचेन्द्र॑ य॒ज्ञं च॑ वर्धय
verses.transliteration: éhi stómām̐ abhí svara-  -abhí gr̥ṇīhy ā́ ruva  bráhma ca no vaso sácā-  -índra yajñáṃ ca vardhaya

translation.text: Come hither, answer thou the song, sing in approval, cry aloud. Good Indra, make our prayer succeed, and prosper this our sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒क्थमिन्द्रा॑य॒ शंस्यं॒ वर्ध॑नं पुरुनि॒ष्षिधे॑ श॒क्रो यथा॑ सु॒तेषु॑ णो रा॒रण॑त्स॒ख्येषु॑ च
verses.transliteration: ukthám índrāya śáṃsyaṃ  várdhanam puruniṣṣídhe  śakró yáthā sutéṣu ṇo  rāráṇat sakhyéṣu ca

translation.text: To Indra must a laud be said, to strengthen him who freely gives, That Ṣakra may take pleasure in our friendship and drink-offerings.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमित्स॑खि॒त्व ई॑महे॒ तं रा॒ये तं सु॒वीर्ये॑ स श॒क्र उ॒त नः॑ शक॒दिन्द्रो॒ वसु॒ दय॑मानः
verses.transliteration: tám ít sakhitvá īmahe  táṃ rāyé táṃ suvī́rye  sá śakrá utá naḥ śakad  índro vásu dáyamānaḥ

translation.text: Him, him we seek for friendship, him for riches and heroic might. For Indra, he is Ṣakra, he shall aid us while he gives us wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒वि॒वृतं॑ सुनि॒रज॒मिन्द्र॒ त्वादा॑त॒मिद्यशः॑ गवा॒मप॑ व्र॒जं वृ॑धि कृणु॒ष्व राधो॑ अद्रिवः
verses.transliteration: suvivŕ̥taṃ sunirájam  índra tvā́dātam íd yáśaḥ  gávām ápa vrajáṃ vr̥dhi  kr̥ṇuṣvá rā́dho adrivaḥ

translation.text: Easy to turn and drive away, Indra, is spoil bestowed by thee. Unclose the stable of the kine, and give us wealth O Thunder-armed

verses.sanskrit_deva: न॒हि त्वा॒ रोद॑सी उ॒भे ऋ॑घा॒यमा॑ण॒मिन्व॑तः जेषः॒ स्व॑र्वतीर॒पः सं गा अ॒स्मभ्यं॑ धूनुहि
verses.transliteration: nahí tvā ródasī ubhé  r̥ghāyámāṇam ínvataḥ  jéṣaḥ svàrvatīr apáḥ  sáṃ gā́ asmábhyaṃ dhūnuhi

translation.text: The heaven and earth contain thee not, together, in thy wrathful mood. Win us the waters of the sky, and send us kine abundantly.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आश्रु॑त्कर्ण श्रु॒धी हवं॒ नू चि॑द्दधिष्व मे॒ गिरः॑ इन्द्र॒ स्तोम॑मि॒मं मम॑ कृ॒ष्वा यु॒जश्चि॒दन्त॑रम्
verses.transliteration: ā́śrutkarṇa śrudhī́ hávaṃ  nū́ cid dadhiṣva me gíraḥ  índra stómam imám máma  kr̥ṣvā́ yujáś cid ántaram

translation.text: Hear, thou whose ear is quick, my call; take to thee readily my songs O Indra, let this laud of mine come nearer even than thy friend.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि॒द्मा हि त्वा॒ वृष॑न्तमं॒ वाजे॑षु हवन॒श्रुत॑म् वृष॑न्तमस्य हूमह ऊ॒तिं स॑हस्र॒सात॑माम्
verses.transliteration: vidmā́ hí tvā vŕ̥ṣantamaṃ  vā́jeṣu havanaśrútam  vŕ̥ṣantamasya hūmahe-  ūtíṃ sahasrasā́tamām

translation.text: We know thee mightiest of all, in battles hearer of our cry. Of thee most mighty we invoke the aid that giveth thousandfold.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ तू न॑ इन्द्र कौशिक मन्दसा॒नः सु॒तं पि॑ब नव्य॒मायुः॒ प्र सू ति॑र कृ॒धी स॑हस्र॒सामृषि॑म्
verses.transliteration: ā́ tū́ na indra kauśika  mandasānáḥ sutám piba  návyam ā́yuḥ prá sū́ tira  kr̥dhī́ sahasrasā́m ŕ̥ṣim

translation.text: O Indra, Son of Kuṣika, drink our libation with delight. Prolong our life anew, and cause the seer to win a thousand gifts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॑ त्वा गिर्वणो॒ गिर॑ इ॒मा भ॑वन्तु वि॒श्वतः॑ वृ॒द्धायु॒मनु॒ वृद्ध॑यो॒ जुष्टा॑ भवन्तु॒ जुष्ट॑यः
verses.transliteration: pári tvā girvaṇo gíraḥ-  imā́ bhavantu viśvátaḥ  vr̥ddhā́yum ánu vŕ̥ddhayo  júṣṭā bhavantu júṣṭayaḥ

translation.text: Lover of song, may these our songs on every side encompass thee: Strengthening thee of lengthened life, may they be dear delights to thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रं॒ विश्वा॑ अवीवृधन्त्समु॒द्रव्य॑चसं॒ गिरः॑ र॒थीत॑मं र॒थीनां॒ वाजा॑नां॒ सत्प॑तिं॒ पति॑म्
verses.transliteration: índraṃ víśvā avīvr̥dhan  samudrávyacasaṃ gíraḥ  rathī́tamaṃ rathī́nāṃ  vā́jānāṃ sátpatim pátim

translation.text: ALL sacred songs have magnified Indra expansive as the sea, The best of warriors borne on cars, the Lord, the very Lord of strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒ख्ये त॑ इन्द्र वा॒जिनो॒ मा भे॑म शवसस्पते त्वाम॒भि प्र णो॑नुमो॒ जेता॑र॒मप॑राजितम्
verses.transliteration: sakhyé ta indra vājíno  mā́ bhema śavasas pate  tvā́m abhí prá ṇonumo  jétāram áparājitam

translation.text: Strong in thy friendship, Indra, Lord of power and might, we have no fear. We glorify with praises thee, the never-conquered conqueror.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पू॒र्वीरिन्द्र॑स्य रा॒तयो॒ न वि द॑स्यन्त्यू॒तयः॑ यदी॒ वाज॑स्य॒ गोम॑तः स्तो॒तृभ्यो॒ मंह॑ते म॒घम्
verses.transliteration: pūrvī́r índrasya rātáyo  ná ví dasyanty ūtáyaḥ  yádī vā́jasya gómataḥ-  stotŕ̥bhyo máṃhate maghám

translation.text: The gifts of Indra from of' old, his saving succours, never fail, When to the praise-singers he gives the boon of substance rich in kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒रां भि॒न्दुर्युवा॑ क॒विरमि॑तौजा अजायत इन्द्रो॒ विश्व॑स्य॒ कर्म॑णो ध॒र्ता व॒ज्री पु॑रुष्टु॒तः
verses.transliteration: purā́m bhindúr yúvā kavír  ámitaujā ajāyata  índro víśvasya kármaṇo  dhartā́ vajrī́ puruṣṭutáḥ

translation.text: Crusher of forts, the young, the wise, of strength unmeasured, was he born Sustainer of each sacred rite, Indra, the Thunderer, much-extolled.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं व॒लस्य॒ गोम॒तोऽपा॑वरद्रिवो॒ बिल॑म् त्वां दे॒वा अबि॑भ्युषस्तु॒ज्यमा॑नास आविषुः
verses.transliteration: tváṃ valásya gómataḥ-  -ápāvar adrivo bílam  tvā́ṃ devā́ ábibhyuṣas  tujyámānāsa āviṣuḥ

translation.text: Lord of the thunder, thou didst burst the cave of Vala rich in cows. The Gods came pressing to thy side, and free from terror aided thee,

verses.sanskrit_deva: तवा॒हं शू॑र रा॒तिभिः॒ प्रत्या॑यं॒ सिन्धु॑मा॒वद॑न् उपा॑तिष्ठन्त गिर्वणो वि॒दुष्टे॒ तस्य॑ का॒रवः॑
verses.transliteration: távāháṃ śūra rātíbhiḥ  práty āyaṃ síndhum āvádan  úpātiṣṭhanta girvaṇo  vidúṣ ṭe tásya kārávaḥ

translation.text: I, Hero, through thy bounties am come to the flood addressing thee. Song-lover, here the singers stand and testify to thee thereof.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा॒याभि॑रिन्द्र मा॒यिनं॒ त्वं शुष्ण॒मवा॑तिरः वि॒दुष्टे॒ तस्य॒ मेधि॑रा॒स्तेषां॒ श्रवां॒स्युत्ति॑र
verses.transliteration: māyā́bhir indra māyínaṃ  tváṃ śúṣṇam ávātiraḥ  vidúṣ ṭe tásya médhirās  téṣāṃ śrávāṃsy út tira

translation.text: The wily Ṣushṇa, Indra! thou o'er-threwest with thy wondrous powers. The wise beheld this deed of thine: now go beyond their eulogies.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॒मीशा॑न॒मोज॑सा॒भि स्तोमा॑ अनूषत स॒हस्रं॒ यस्य॑ रा॒तय॑ उ॒त वा॒ सन्ति॒ भूय॑सीः
verses.transliteration: índram ī́śānam ójasā-  -abhí stómā anūṣata  sahásraṃ yásya rātáyaḥ-  utá vā sánti bhū́yasīḥ

translation.text: Our songs of praise have glorified Indra who ruleth by his might, Whose precious gifts in thousands come, yea, even more abundantly.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निं दू॒तं वृ॑णीमहे॒ होता॑रं वि॒श्ववे॑दसम् अ॒स्य य॒ज्ञस्य॑ सु॒क्रतु॑म्
verses.transliteration: agníṃ dūtáṃ vr̥ṇīmahe  hótāraṃ viśvávedasam  asyá yajñásya sukrátum

translation.text: WE choose Agni the messenger, the herald, master of all wealth, Well skilled in this our sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निम॑ग्निं॒ हवी॑मभिः॒ सदा॑ हवन्त वि॒श्पति॑म् ह॒व्य॒वाहं॑ पुरुप्रि॒यम्
verses.transliteration: agním-agniṃ hávīmabhiḥ  sádā havanta viśpátim  havyavā́ham purupriyám

translation.text: With callings ever they invoke Agni, Agni, Lord of the House, Oblation-bearer, much beloved.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॑ दे॒वाँ इ॒हा व॑ह जज्ञा॒नो वृ॒क्तब॑र्हिषे असि॒ होता॑ न॒ ईड्यः॑
verses.transliteration: ágne devā́m̐ ihā́ vaha  jajñānó vr̥ktábarhiṣe  ási hótā na ī́ḍyaḥ

translation.text: Bring the Gods hither, Agni, born for him who strews the sacred grass: Thou art our herald, meet for praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ताँ उ॑श॒तो वि बो॑धय॒ यद॑ग्ने॒ यासि॑ दू॒त्य॑म् दे॒वैरा स॑त्सि ब॒र्हिषि॑
verses.transliteration: tā́m̐ uśató ví bodhaya  yád agne yā́si dūtyàm  devaír ā́ satsi barhíṣi

translation.text: Wake up the willing Gods, since thou, Agni, performest embassage: Sit on the sacred grass with Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: घृता॑हवन दीदिवः॒ प्रति॑ ष्म॒ रिष॑तो दह अग्ने॒ त्वं र॑क्ष॒स्विनः॑
verses.transliteration: ghŕ̥tāhavana dīdivaḥ  práti ṣma ríṣato daha  ágne tváṃ rakṣasvínaḥ

translation.text: O Agni, radiant One, to whom the holy oil is poured, bum up Our enemies whom fiends protect.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निना॒ग्निः समि॑ध्यते क॒विर्गृ॒हप॑ति॒र्युवा॑ ह॒व्य॒वाड्जु॒ह्वा॑स्यः
verses.transliteration: agnínāgníḥ sám idhyate  kavír gr̥hápatir yúvā  havyavā́ḍ juhvā̀syaḥ

translation.text: By Agni Agni is inflamed, Lord of the House, wise, young, who bears The gift: the ladle is his mouth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क॒विम॒ग्निमुप॑ स्तुहि स॒त्यध॑र्माणमध्व॒रे दे॒वम॑मीव॒चात॑नम्
verses.transliteration: kavím agním úpa stuhi  satyádharmāṇam adhvaré  devám amīvacā́tanam

translation.text: Praise Agni in the sacrifice, the Sage whose ways are ever true, The God who driveth grief away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्त्वाम॑ग्ने ह॒विष्प॑तिर्दू॒तं दे॑व सप॒र्यति॑ तस्य॑ स्म प्रावि॒ता भ॑व
verses.transliteration: yás tvā́m agne havíṣpatir  dūtáṃ deva saparyáti  tásya sma prāvitā́ bhava

translation.text: God, Agni, be his strong defence who lord of sacrificial gifts, Worshippeth thee the messenger.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो अ॒ग्निं दे॒ववी॑तये ह॒विष्माँ॑ आ॒विवा॑सति तस्मै॑ पावक मृळय
verses.transliteration: yó agníṃ devávītaye  havíṣmām̐ āvívāsati  tásmai pāvaka mr̥ḷaya

translation.text: Whoso with sacred gift would fain call Agni to the feast of Gods, O Purifier, favour him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नः॑ पावक दीदि॒वोऽग्ने॑ दे॒वाँ इ॒हा व॑ह उप॑ य॒ज्ञं ह॒विश्च॑ नः
verses.transliteration: sá naḥ pāvaka dīdivaḥ-  ágne devā́m̐ ihā́ vaha  úpa yajñáṃ havíś ca naḥ

translation.text: Such, Agni, Purifier, bright, bring hither to our sacrifice, To our oblation bring the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नः॒ स्तवा॑न॒ आ भ॑र गाय॒त्रेण॒ नवी॑यसा र॒यिं वी॒रव॑ती॒मिष॑म्
verses.transliteration: sá na stávāna ā́ bhara  gāyatréṇa návīyasā  rayíṃ vīrávatīm íṣam

translation.text: So lauded by our newest song of praise bring opulence to us, And food, with heroes for our sons.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॑ शु॒क्रेण॑ शो॒चिषा॒ विश्वा॑भिर्दे॒वहू॑तिभिः इ॒मं स्तोमं॑ जुषस्व नः
verses.transliteration: ágne śukréṇa śocíṣā  víśvābhir deváhūtibhiḥ  imáṃ stómaṃ juṣasva naḥ

translation.text: O Agni, by effulgent flame, by all invokings of the Gods, Show pleasure in this laud of ours.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सुस॑मिद्धो न॒ आ व॑ह दे॒वाँ अ॑ग्ने ह॒विष्म॑ते होतः॑ पावक॒ यक्षि॑ च
verses.transliteration: súsamiddho na ā́ vaha  devā́m̐ agne havíṣmate  hótaḥ pāvaka yákṣi ca

translation.text: AGNI, well-kindled, bring the Gods for him who offers holy gifts. Worship them, Purifier, Priest.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मधु॑मन्तं तनूनपाद्य॒ज्ञं दे॒वेषु॑ नः कवे अ॒द्या कृ॑णुहि वी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: mádhumantaṃ tanūnapād  yajñáṃ devéṣu naḥ kave  adyā́ kr̥ṇuhi vītáye

translation.text: Son of Thyself, present, O Sage, our sacrifice to the Gods today. Sweet to the taste, that they may feast.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नरा॒शंस॑मि॒ह प्रि॒यम॒स्मिन्य॒ज्ञ उप॑ ह्वये मधु॑जिह्वं हवि॒ष्कृत॑म्
verses.transliteration: nárāśáṃsam ihá priyám  asmín yajñá úpa hvaye  mádhujihvaṃ haviṣkŕ̥tam

translation.text: Dear Narâṣansa, sweet of tongue, the giver of oblations, I Invoke to this our sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॑ सु॒खत॑मे॒ रथे॑ दे॒वाँ ई॑ळि॒त आ व॑ह असि॒ होता॒ मनु॑र्हितः
verses.transliteration: ágne sukhátame ráthe  devā́m̐ īḷitá ā́ vaha  ási hótā mánurhitaḥ

translation.text: Agni, on thy most easy car, glorified, hither bring the Gods: Manu appointed thee as Priest.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स्तृ॒णी॒त ब॒र्हिरा॑नु॒षग्घृ॒तपृ॑ष्ठं मनीषिणः यत्रा॒मृत॑स्य॒ चक्ष॑णम्
verses.transliteration: str̥ṇītá barhír ānuṣág  ghr̥tápr̥ṣṭham manīṣiṇaḥ  yátrāmŕ̥tasya cákṣaṇam

translation.text: Strew, O ye wise, the sacred grass that drips with oil, in order due, Where the Immortal is beheld.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि श्र॑यन्तामृता॒वृधो॒ द्वारो॑ दे॒वीर॑स॒श्चतः॑ अ॒द्या नू॒नं च॒ यष्ट॑वे
verses.transliteration: ví śrayantām r̥tāvŕ̥dho  dvā́ro devī́r asaścátaḥ  adyā́ nūnáṃ ca yáṣṭave

translation.text: Thrown open be the Doors Divine, unfailing, that assist the rite, For sacrifice this day and now.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नक्तो॒षासा॑ सु॒पेश॑सा॒स्मिन्य॒ज्ञ उप॑ ह्वये इ॒दं नो॑ ब॒र्हिरा॒सदे॑
verses.transliteration: náktoṣā́sā supéśasā-  asmín yajñá úpa hvaye  idáṃ no barhír āsáde

translation.text: I call the lovely Night and Dawn to seat them on the holy grass At this our solemn sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ता सु॑जि॒ह्वा उप॑ ह्वये॒ होता॑रा॒ दैव्या॑ क॒वी य॒ज्ञं नो॑ यक्षतामि॒मम्
verses.transliteration: tā́ sujihvā́ úpa hvaye  hótārā daívyā kavī́  yajñáṃ no yakṣatām imám

translation.text: The two Invokers I invite, the wise, divine and sweet of tongue, To celebrate this our sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इळा॒ सर॑स्वती म॒ही ति॒स्रो दे॒वीर्म॑यो॒भुवः॑ ब॒र्हिः सी॑दन्त्व॒स्रिधः॑
verses.transliteration: íḷā sárasvatī mahī́  tisró devī́r mayobhúvaḥ  barhíḥ sīdantv asrídhaḥ

translation.text: Iḷâ, Sarasvatî, Mahi, three Goddesses who bring delight, Be seated, peaceful, on the grass.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒ह त्वष्टा॑रमग्रि॒यं वि॒श्वरू॑प॒मुप॑ ह्वये अ॒स्माक॑मस्तु॒ केव॑लः
verses.transliteration: ihá tváṣṭāram agriyáṃ  viśvárūpam úpa hvaye  asmā́kam astu kévalaḥ

translation.text: Tvashṭar I call, the earliest born, the wearer of all forms at will: May he be ours and curs alone.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अव॑ सृजा वनस्पते॒ देव॑ दे॒वेभ्यो॑ ह॒विः प्र दा॒तुर॑स्तु॒ चेत॑नम्
verses.transliteration: áva sr̥jā vanaspate  déva devébhyo havíḥ  prá dātúr astu cétanam

translation.text: God, Sovran of the Wood, present this our oblation to the Gods, And let the giver be renowned.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स्वाहा॑ य॒ज्ञं कृ॑णोत॒नेन्द्रा॑य॒ यज्व॑नो गृ॒हे तत्र॑ दे॒वाँ उप॑ ह्वये
verses.transliteration: svā́hā yajñáṃ kr̥ṇotana-  -índrāya yájvano gr̥hé  tátra devā́m̐ úpa hvaye

translation.text: With Svâhâ pay the sacrifice to Indra in the offerer's house: Thither I call the Deities.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऐभि॑रग्ने॒ दुवो॒ गिरो॒ विश्वे॑भिः॒ सोम॑पीतये दे॒वेभि॑र्याहि॒ यक्षि॑ च
verses.transliteration: aíbhir agne dúvo gíro  víśvebhiḥ sómapītaye  devébhir yāhi yákṣi ca

translation.text: To drink the Soma, Agni, come, to our service and our songs. With all these Gods; and worship them.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ त्वा॒ कण्वा॑ अहूषत गृ॒णन्ति॑ विप्र ते॒ धियः॑ दे॒वेभि॑रग्न॒ आ ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: ā́ tvā káṇvā ahūṣata  gr̥ṇánti vipra te dhíyaḥ  devébhir agna ā́ gahi

translation.text: The Kaṇvas have invoked thee; they, O Singer, sing thee songs of praise Agni, come hither with the Gods;

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒न्द्र॒वा॒यू बृह॒स्पतिं॑ मि॒त्राग्निं पू॒षणं॒ भग॑म् आ॒दि॒त्यान्मारु॑तं ग॒णम्
verses.transliteration: indravāyū́ bŕ̥haspátim  mitrā́gním pūṣáṇam bhágam  ādityā́n mā́rutaṃ gaṇám

translation.text: Indra, Vâyu, Br̥ihaspati, Mitra, Agni, Pûshan, Bhaga, Âdityas, and the Marut host.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र वो॑ भ्रियन्त॒ इन्द॑वो मत्स॒रा मा॑दयि॒ष्णवः॑ द्र॒प्सा मध्व॑श्चमू॒षदः॑
verses.transliteration: prá vo bhriyanta índavo  matsarā́ mādayiṣṇávaḥ  drapsā́ mádhvaś camūṣádaḥ

translation.text: For you these juices are poured forth that gladden and exhilarate, The meath-drops resting in the cup.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ईळ॑ते॒ त्वाम॑व॒स्यवः॒ कण्वा॑सो वृ॒क्तब॑र्हिषः ह॒विष्म॑न्तो अरं॒कृतः॑
verses.transliteration: ī́ḷate tvā́m avasyávaḥ  káṇvāso vr̥ktábarhiṣaḥ  havíṣmanto araṃkŕ̥taḥ

translation.text: The sons of Kaṇva fain for help adore thee, having strewn the grass, With offerings and all things prepared.

verses.sanskrit_deva: घृ॒तपृ॑ष्ठा मनो॒युजो॒ ये त्वा॒ वह॑न्ति॒ वह्न॑यः आ दे॒वान्त्सोम॑पीतये
verses.transliteration: ghr̥tápr̥ṣṭhā manoyújo  yé tvā váhanti váhnayaḥ  ā́ devā́n sómapītaye

translation.text: Let the swift steeds who carry thee, thought-yoked and dropping holy oil, Bring the Gods to the Soma draught.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तान्यज॑त्राँ ऋता॒वृधोऽग्ने॒ पत्नी॑वतस्कृधि मध्वः॑ सुजिह्व पायय
verses.transliteration: tā́n yájatrām̐ r̥tāvŕ̥dhaḥ-  -ágne pátnīvatas kr̥dhi  mádhvaḥ sujihva pāyaya

translation.text: Adored, the strengtheners of Law, unite them, Agni, with their Dames: Make them drink meath, O bright of tongue.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ये यज॑त्रा॒ य ईड्या॒स्ते ते॑ पिबन्तु जि॒ह्वया॑ मधो॑रग्ने॒ वष॑ट्कृति
verses.transliteration: yé yájatrā yá ī́ḍyās  té te pibantu jihváyā  mádhor agne váṣaṭkr̥ti

translation.text: Let them, O Agni, who deserve worship and praise drink with thy tongue Tle meath in solemn sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आकीं॒ सूर्य॑स्य रोच॒नाद्विश्वा॑न्दे॒वाँ उ॑ष॒र्बुधः॑ विप्रो॒ होते॒ह व॑क्षति
verses.transliteration: ā́kīṃ sū́ryasya rocanā́d  víśvān devā́m̐ uṣarbúdhaḥ  vípro hótehá vakṣati

translation.text: Away, from the Sun's realm of light, the wise invoking Priest shall bring All Gods awaking with the dawn.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वे॑भिः सो॒म्यं मध्वग्न॒ इन्द्रे॑ण वा॒युना॑ पिबा॑ मि॒त्रस्य॒ धाम॑भिः
verses.transliteration: víśvebhiḥ somyám mádhu-  ágna índreṇa vāyúnā  píbā mitrásya dhā́mabhiḥ

translation.text: With all the Gods, with Indra, with Vâyu, and Mitra's splendours, drink, Agni, the pleasant Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं होता॒ मनु॑र्हि॒तोऽग्ने॑ य॒ज्ञेषु॑ सीदसि सेमं नो॑ अध्व॒रं य॑ज
verses.transliteration: tváṃ hótā mánurhitaḥ-  -ágne yajñéṣu sīdasi  sémáṃ no adhvaráṃ yaja

translation.text: Ordained by Manu as our Priest, thou sittest, Agni, at each rite: Hallow thou this our sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यु॒क्ष्वा ह्यरु॑षी॒ रथे॑ ह॒रितो॑ देव रो॒हितः॑ ताभि॑र्दे॒वाँ इ॒हा व॑ह
verses.transliteration: yukṣvā́ hy áruṣī ráthe  haríto deva rohítaḥ  tā́bhir devā́m̐ ihā́ vaha

translation.text: Harness the Red Mares to thy car, the Bays, O God, the flaming ones: With those bring hitherward the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॒ सोमं॒ पिब॑ ऋ॒तुना त्वा॑ विश॒न्त्विन्द॑वः म॒त्स॒रास॒स्तदो॑कसः
verses.transliteration: índra sómam píba r̥túnā-  -ā́ tvā viśantv índavaḥ  matsarā́sas tádokasaḥ

translation.text: O INDRA drink the Soma juice with Rtu; let the cheering drops Sink deep within, which settle there.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मरु॑तः॒ पिब॑त ऋ॒तुना॑ पो॒त्राद्य॒ज्ञं पु॑नीतन यू॒यं हि ष्ठा सु॑दानवः
verses.transliteration: márutaḥ píbata r̥túnā  potrā́d yajñám punītana  yūyáṃ hí ṣṭhā́ sudānavaḥ

translation.text: Drink from the Purifier's cup, Maruts, with Rtu; sanctify The rite, for ye give precious gifts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि य॒ज्ञं गृ॑णीहि नो॒ ग्नावो॒ नेष्टः॒ पिब॑ ऋ॒तुना॑ त्वं हि र॑त्न॒धा असि॑
verses.transliteration: abhí yajñáṃ gr̥ṇīhi no  gnā́vo néṣṭaḥ píba r̥túnā  tváṃ hí ratnadhā́ ási

translation.text: O Neshṭar, with thy Dame accept our sacrifice; with R̥itudrink, For thou art he who giveth wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॑ दे॒वाँ इ॒हा व॑ह सा॒दया॒ योनि॑षु त्रि॒षु परि॑ भूष॒ पिब॑ ऋ॒तुना॑
verses.transliteration: ágne devā́m̐ ihā́ vaha  sādáyā yóniṣu triṣú  pári bhūṣa píba r̥túnā

translation.text: Bring the Gods, Agni; in the three appointed places set them down: Surround them, and with R̥itudrink.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ब्राह्म॑णादिन्द्र॒ राध॑सः॒ पिबा॒ सोम॑मृ॒तूँरनु॑ तवेद्धि स॒ख्यमस्तृ॑तम्
verses.transliteration: brā́hmaṇād indra rā́dhasaḥ  píbā sómam r̥tū́m̐r ánu  távéd dhí sakhyám ástr̥tam

translation.text: Drink Soma after the Rtus, from the Brahmana's bounty: undissolved, O Indra, is thy friendship's bond.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यु॒वं दक्षं॑ धृतव्रत॒ मित्रा॑वरुण दू॒ळभ॑म् ऋ॒तुना॑ य॒ज्ञमा॑शाथे
verses.transliteration: yuváṃ dákṣaṃ dhr̥tavrata  mítrāvaruṇa dūḷábham  r̥túnā yajñám āśāthe

translation.text: Mitra, Varuṇa, ye whose ways are firm – a Power that none deceives-, With R̥ituye have reached the rite.

verses.sanskrit_deva: द्र॒वि॒णो॒दा द्रवि॑णसो॒ ग्राव॑हस्तासो अध्व॒रे य॒ज्ञेषु॑ दे॒वमी॑ळते
verses.transliteration: draviṇodā́ dráviṇaso  grā́vahastāso adhvaré  yajñéṣu devám īḷate

translation.text: The Soma-pressers, fain for wealth, praise the Wealth-giver in the rite, In sacrifices praise the God.

verses.sanskrit_deva: द्र॒वि॒णो॒दा द॑दातु नो॒ वसू॑नि॒ यानि॑ शृण्वि॒रे दे॒वेषु॒ ता व॑नामहे
verses.transliteration: draviṇodā́ dadātu no  vásūni yā́ni śr̥ṇviré  devéṣu tā́ vanāmahe

translation.text: May the Wealth-giver grant to us riches that shall be far renowned. These things we gain, among the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: द्र॒वि॒णो॒दाः पि॑पीषति जु॒होत॒ प्र च॑ तिष्ठत ने॒ष्ट्रादृ॒तुभि॑रिष्यत
verses.transliteration: draviṇodā́ḥ pipīṣati  juhóta prá ca tiṣṭhata  neṣṭrā́d r̥túbhir iṣyata

translation.text: He with the R̥ita fain would drink, Wealth-giver, from the Neshṭar's bowl. Haste, give your offering, and depart.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यत्त्वा॑ तु॒रीय॑मृ॒तुभि॒र्द्रवि॑णोदो॒ यजा॑महे अध॑ स्मा नो द॒दिर्भ॑व
verses.transliteration: yát tvā turī́yam r̥túbhir  dráviṇodo yájāmahe  ádha smā no dadír bhava

translation.text: As we this fourth time, Wealth-giver, honour thee with the Rtus, be A Giver bountiful to us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अश्वि॑ना॒ पिब॑तं॒ मधु॒ दीद्य॑ग्नी शुचिव्रता ऋ॒तुना॑ यज्ञवाहसा
verses.transliteration: áśvinā píbatam mádhu  dī́dyagnī śucivratā  r̥túnā yajñavāhasā

translation.text: Drink ye the meath, O Aṣvins bright with flames, whose acts are pure. who with Rtus accept the sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: गार्ह॑पत्येन सन्त्य ऋ॒तुना॑ यज्ञ॒नीर॑सि दे॒वान्दे॑वय॒ते य॑ज
verses.transliteration: gā́rhapatyena santya  r̥túnā yajñanī́r asi  devā́n devayaté yaja

translation.text: With Rtu, through the house-fire, thou, kind Giver, guidest sacrifice: Worship the Gods for the pious man.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ त्वा॑ वहन्तु॒ हर॑यो॒ वृष॑णं॒ सोम॑पीतये इन्द्र॑ त्वा॒ सूर॑चक्षसः
verses.transliteration: ā́ tvā vahantu hárayo  vŕ̥ṣaṇaṃ sómapītaye  índra tvā sū́racakṣasaḥ

translation.text: LET thy Bay Steeds bring thee, the Strong, hither to drink the Soma draught- Those, Indra, who are bright as suns.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒मा धा॒ना घृ॑त॒स्नुवो॒ हरी॑ इ॒होप॑ वक्षतः इन्द्रं॑ सु॒खत॑मे॒ रथे॑
verses.transliteration: imā́ dhānā́ ghr̥tasnúvo  hárī ihópa vakṣataḥ  índraṃ sukhátame ráthe

translation.text: Here are the grains bedewed with oil: hither let the Bay Coursers bring Indra upon his easiest car.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रं॑ प्रा॒तर्ह॑वामह॒ इन्द्रं॑ प्रय॒त्य॑ध्व॒रे इन्द्रं॒ सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: índram prātár havāmahe-  índram prayaty àdhvaré  índraṃ sómasya pītáye

translation.text: Indra at early morn we call, Indra in course of sacrifice, Indra to drink the Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उप॑ नः सु॒तमा ग॑हि॒ हरि॑भिरिन्द्र के॒शिभिः॑ सु॒ते हि त्वा॒ हवा॑महे
verses.transliteration: úpa naḥ sutám ā́ gahi  háribhir indra keśíbhiḥ  suté hí tvā hávāmahe

translation.text: Come hither, with thy long-maned Steeds, O Indra, to- the draught we pour We call thee wher, the juice is shed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सेमं नः॒ स्तोम॒मा ग॒ह्युपे॒दं सव॑नं सु॒तम् गौ॒रो न तृ॑षि॒तः पि॑ब
verses.transliteration: sémáṃ na stómam ā́ gahi-  úpedáṃ sávanaṃ sutám  gauró ná tr̥ṣitáḥ piba

translation.text: Come thou to this our song of praise, to the libation poured for thee Drink of it like a stag athirst.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒मे सोमा॑स॒ इन्द॑वः सु॒तासो॒ अधि॑ ब॒र्हिषि॑ ताँ इ॑न्द्र॒ सह॑से पिब
verses.transliteration: imé sómāsa índavaḥ  sutā́so ádhi barhíṣi  tā́m̐ indra sáhase piba

translation.text: Here are the drops of Soma juice expressed on sacred grass: thereof Drink, Indra, to increase thy might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यं ते॒ स्तोमो॑ अग्रि॒यो हृ॑दि॒स्पृग॑स्तु॒ शंत॑मः अथा॒ सोमं॑ सु॒तं पि॑ब
verses.transliteration: ayáṃ te stómo agriyó  hr̥dispŕ̥g astu śáṃtamaḥ  áthā sómaṃ sutám piba

translation.text: Welcome to thee be this our hymn, reaching thy heart, most excellent: Then drink the Soma juice expressed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्व॒मित्सव॑नं सु॒तमिन्द्रो॒ मदा॑य गच्छति वृ॒त्र॒हा सोम॑पीतये
verses.transliteration: víśvam ít sávanaṃ sutám  índro mádāya gachati  vr̥trahā́ sómapītaye

translation.text: To every draught of pressed-out juice Indra, the Vr̥itra-slayer, comes, To drink the Soma for delight.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सेमं नः॒ काम॒मा पृ॑ण॒ गोभि॒रश्वैः॑ शतक्रतो स्तवा॑म त्वा स्वा॒ध्यः॑
verses.transliteration: sémáṃ naḥ kā́mam ā́ pr̥ṇa  góbhir áśvaiḥ śatakrato  stávāma tvā svādhyàḥ

translation.text: Fulfil, O Ṣatakratu, all our wish with horses and with kine: With holy thoughts we sing thy praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रा॒वरु॑णयोर॒हं स॒म्राजो॒रव॒ आ वृ॑णे ता नो॑ मृळात ई॒दृशे॑
verses.transliteration: índrāváruṇayor aháṃ  samrā́jor áva ā́ vr̥ṇe  tā́ no mr̥ḷāta īdŕ̥śe

translation.text: I CRAVE help from the Imperial Lords, from Indra-Varuṇa; may they Both favour one of us like me.

verses.sanskrit_deva: गन्ता॑रा॒ हि स्थोऽव॑से॒ हवं॒ विप्र॑स्य॒ माव॑तः ध॒र्तारा॑ चर्षणी॒नाम्
verses.transliteration: gántārā hí sthó 'vase  hávaṃ víprasya mā́vataḥ  dhartā́rā carṣaṇīnā́m

translation.text: Guardians of men, ye ever come with ready succour at the call Of every singer such as I.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒नु॒का॒मं त॑र्पयेथा॒मिन्द्रा॑वरुण रा॒य आ ता वां॒ नेदि॑ष्ठमीमहे
verses.transliteration: anukāmáṃ tarpayethām  índrāvaruṇa rāyá ā́  tā́ vāṃ nédiṣṭham īmahe

translation.text: Sate you, according to your wish, O Indra-Varuṇa, with wealth: Fain would we have you nearest us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यु॒वाकु॒ हि शची॑नां यु॒वाकु॑ सुमती॒नाम् भू॒याम॑ वाज॒दाव्ना॑म्
verses.transliteration: yuvā́ku hí śácīnāṃ  yuvā́ku sumatīnā́m  bhūyā́ma vājadā́vnām

translation.text: May we be sharers of the powers, sharers of the benevolence Of you who give strength bounteously.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रः॑ सहस्र॒दाव्नां॒ वरु॑णः॒ शंस्या॑नाम् क्रतु॑र्भवत्यु॒क्थ्यः॑
verses.transliteration: índraḥ sahasradā́vnāṃ  váruṇaḥ śáṃsyānām  krátur bhavaty ukthyàḥ

translation.text: Indra and Varuṇa, among givers of thousands, meet for praise, Are Powers who merit highest laud.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तयो॒रिदव॑सा व॒यं स॒नेम॒ नि च॑ धीमहि स्यादु॒त प्र॒रेच॑नम्
verses.transliteration: táyor íd ávasā vayáṃ  sanéma ní ca dhīmahi  syā́d utá prarécanam

translation.text: Through their protection may we gain great store of wealth, and heap it up Enough and still to spare, be ours.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रा॑वरुण वाम॒हं हु॒वे चि॒त्राय॒ राध॑से अ॒स्मान्त्सु जि॒ग्युष॑स्कृतम्
verses.transliteration: índrāvaruṇa vām aháṃ  huvé citrā́ya rā́dhase  asmā́n sú jigyúṣas kr̥tam

translation.text: O Indra-Varuṇa, on you for wealth in many a form I call: Still keep ye us victorious.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रा॑वरुण॒ नू नु वां॒ सिषा॑सन्तीषु धी॒ष्वा अ॒स्मभ्यं॒ शर्म॑ यच्छतम्
verses.transliteration: índrāvaruṇa nū́ nú vāṃ  síṣāsantīṣu dhīṣv ā́  asmábhyaṃ śárma yachatam

translation.text: O Indra-Varuṇa, – through our songs that seek to win you to ourselves, Give us at once your sheltering help.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र वा॑मश्नोतु सुष्टु॒तिरिन्द्रा॑वरुण॒ यां हु॒वे यामृ॒धाथे॑ स॒धस्तु॑तिम्
verses.transliteration: prá vām aśnotu suṣṭutír  índrāvaruṇa yā́ṃ huvé  yā́m r̥dhā́the sadhástutim

translation.text: O Indra-Varuṇa, to you may fair praise which I offer come, joint eulogy which ye dignify.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सो॒मानं॒ स्वर॑णं कृणु॒हि ब्र॑ह्मणस्पते क॒क्षीव॑न्तं॒ य औ॑शि॒जः
verses.transliteration: somā́naṃ sváraṇaṃ  kr̥ṇuhí brahmaṇas pate  kakṣī́vantaṃ yá auśijáḥ

translation.text: O BRAHMANAPSATI, make him who presses Soma glorious, Even Kakshîvân Auṣija.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो रे॒वान्यो अ॑मीव॒हा व॑सु॒वित्पु॑ष्टि॒वर्ध॑नः स नः॑ सिषक्तु॒ यस्तु॒रः
verses.transliteration: yó revā́n yó amīvahā́  vasuvít puṣṭivárdhanaḥ  sá naḥ siṣaktu yás turáḥ

translation.text: The rich, the healer of disease, who giveth wealth, increaseth store, The prompt,– may he be with us still.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा नः॒ शंसो॒ अर॑रुषो धू॒र्तिः प्रण॒ङ्मर्त्य॑स्य रक्षा॑ णो ब्रह्मणस्पते
verses.transliteration: mā́ naḥ śáṃso áraruṣo  dhūrtíḥ práṇaṅ mártyasya  rákṣā ṇo brahmaṇas pate

translation.text: Let not the foeman's curse, let not a mortal's onslaught fall on us Preserve us, Brahmaṇaspati.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स घा॑ वी॒रो न रि॑ष्यति॒ यमिन्द्रो॒ ब्रह्म॑ण॒स्पतिः॑ सोमो॑ हि॒नोति॒ मर्त्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: sá ghā vīró ná riṣyati  yám índro bráhmaṇas pátiḥ  sómo hinóti mártyam

translation.text: Ne'er is the mortal hero harmed whom Indra, Brahmaṇaspati, And Soma graciously inspire.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं तं ब्र॑ह्मणस्पते॒ सोम॒ इन्द्र॑श्च॒ मर्त्य॑म् दक्षि॑णा पा॒त्वंह॑सः
verses.transliteration: tváṃ tám brahmaṇas pate  sóma índraś ca mártyam  dákṣiṇā pātv áṃhasaḥ

translation.text: Do, thou, O Brahmaṇaspati, and Indra, Soma, Dakshina, Preserve that mortal from distress.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सद॑स॒स्पति॒मद्भु॑तं प्रि॒यमिन्द्र॑स्य॒ काम्य॑म् स॒निं मे॒धाम॑यासिषम्
verses.transliteration: sádasas pátim ádbhutam  priyám índrasya kā́myam  saním medhā́m ayāsiṣam

translation.text: To the Assembly's wondrous Lord, to Indra's lovely Friend who gives Wisdom, have I drawn near in prayer.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्मा॑दृ॒ते न सिध्य॑ति य॒ज्ञो वि॑प॒श्चित॑श्च॒न स धी॒नां योग॑मिन्वति
verses.transliteration: yásmād r̥té ná sídhyati  yajñó vipaścítaś caná  sá dhīnā́ṃ yógam invati

translation.text: He without whom no sacrifice, e'en of the wise man, prospers; he Stirs up the series of thoughts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आदृ॑ध्नोति ह॒विष्कृ॑तिं॒ प्राञ्चं॑ कृणोत्यध्व॒रम् होत्रा॑ दे॒वेषु॑ गच्छति
verses.transliteration: ā́d r̥dhnoti havíṣkr̥tim  prā́ñcaṃ kr̥ṇoty adhvarám  hótrā devéṣu gachati

translation.text: He makes the oblation prosper, he promotes the course of sacrifice: Our voice of praise goes to the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नरा॒शंसं॑ सु॒धृष्ट॑म॒मप॑श्यं स॒प्रथ॑स्तमम् दि॒वो न सद्म॑मखसम्
verses.transliteration: nárāśáṃsaṃ sudhŕ̥ṣṭamam  ápaśyaṃ sapráthastamam  divó ná sádmamakhasam

translation.text: I have seen Narâṣansa, him most resolute, most widely famed, As 'twere the Household Priest of heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्रति॒ त्यं चारु॑मध्व॒रं गो॑पी॒थाय॒ प्र हू॑यसे म॒रुद्भि॑रग्न॒ आ ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: práti tyáṃ cā́rum adhvaráṃ  gopīthā́ya prá hūyase  marúdbhir agna ā́ gahi

translation.text: To this fair sacrifice to drink the milky draught thou art invoked: O Agni, with the Maruts come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न॒हि दे॒वो न मर्त्यो॑ म॒हस्तव॒ क्रतुं॑ प॒रः म॒रुद्भि॑रग्न॒ आ ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: nahí devó ná mártyo  mahás táva krátum paráḥ  marúdbhir agna ā́ gahi

translation.text: No mortal man, no God exceeds thy mental power, O Mighty one – O Agni, with the Maruts come

verses.sanskrit_deva: ये म॒हो रज॑सो वि॒दुर्विश्वे॑ दे॒वासो॑ अ॒द्रुहः॑ म॒रुद्भि॑रग्न॒ आ ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: yé mahó rájaso vidúr  víśve devā́so adrúhaḥ  marúdbhir agna ā́ gahi

translation.text: All Gods devoid of guile, who know the mighty region of mid-air: O Agni, with those Maruts come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य उ॒ग्रा अ॒र्कमा॑नृ॒चुरना॑धृष्टास॒ ओज॑सा म॒रुद्भि॑रग्न॒ आ ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: yá ugrā́ arkám ānr̥cúr  ánādhr̥ṣṭāsa ójasā  marúdbhir agna ā́ gahi

translation.text: The terrible, who sing their song, not to be overcome by might: O Agni, with those Maruts come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ये शु॒भ्रा घो॒रव॑र्पसः सुक्ष॒त्रासो॑ रि॒शाद॑सः म॒रुद्भि॑रग्न॒ आ ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: yé śubhrā́ ghorávarpasaḥ  sukṣatrā́so riśā́dasaḥ  marúdbhir agna ā́ gahi

translation.text: Brilliant, and awful in their form, mighty, devourers of their foes': O Agni, with those Maruts come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ये नाक॒स्याधि॑ रोच॒ने दि॒वि दे॒वास॒ आस॑ते म॒रुद्भि॑रग्न॒ आ ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: yé nā́kasyā́dhi rocané  diví devā́sa ā́sate  marúdbhir agna ā́ gahi

translation.text: Who sit as Deities in heaven, above the sky-vault's luminous sphere: O Agni, with those Maruts come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य ई॒ङ्खय॑न्ति॒ पर्व॑तान्ति॒रः स॑मु॒द्रम॑र्ण॒वम् म॒रुद्भि॑रग्न॒ आ ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: yá īṅkháyanti párvatān  tiráḥ samudrám arṇavám  marúdbhir agna ā́ gahi

translation.text: Who scatter clouds about the sky, away over the billowy sea: O Agni, with those Maruts come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ ये त॒न्वन्ति॑ र॒श्मिभि॑स्ति॒रः स॑मु॒द्रमोज॑सा म॒रुद्भि॑रग्न॒ आ ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: ā́ yé tanvánti raśmíbhis  tiráḥ samudrám ójasā  marúdbhir agna ā́ gahi

translation.text: Who with their bright beams spread them forth over the ocean in their might O Agni, with those Maruts come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि त्वा॑ पू॒र्वपी॑तये सृ॒जामि॑ सो॒म्यं मधु॑ म॒रुद्भि॑रग्न॒ आ ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: abhí tvā pūrvápītaye  sr̥jā́mi somyám mádhu  marúdbhir agna ā́ gahi

translation.text: For thee, to be thine early draught, I pour the Soma-mingled meath: O Agni, with the Maruts come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यं दे॒वाय॒ जन्म॑ने॒ स्तोमो॒ विप्रे॑भिरास॒या अका॑रि रत्न॒धात॑मः
verses.transliteration: ayáṃ devā́ya jánmane  stómo víprebhir āsayā́  ákāri ratnadhā́tamaḥ

translation.text: FOR the Celestial Race this song of praise which gives wealth lavishly Was made by singers with their lips.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य इन्द्रा॑य वचो॒युजा॑ तत॒क्षुर्मन॑सा॒ हरी॑ शमी॑भिर्य॒ज्ञमा॑शत
verses.transliteration: yá índrāya vacoyújā  tatakṣúr mánasā hárī  śámībhir yajñám āśata

translation.text: They who for Indra, with their mind, formed horses harnessed by a word, Attained by works to sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तक्ष॒न्नास॑त्याभ्यां॒ परि॑ज्मानं सु॒खं रथ॑म् तक्ष॑न्धे॒नुं स॑ब॒र्दुघा॑म्
verses.transliteration: tákṣan nā́satyābhyām  párijmānaṃ sukháṃ rátham  tákṣan dhenúṃ sabardúghām

translation.text: They for the two Nâsatyas wrought a light car moving every way: They formed a nectar-yielding cow.

verses.sanskrit_deva: युवा॑ना पि॒तरा॒ पुनः॑ स॒त्यम॑न्त्रा ऋजू॒यवः॑ ऋ॒भवो॑ वि॒ष्ट्य॑क्रत
verses.transliteration: yúvānā pitárā púnaḥ  satyámantrā r̥jūyávaḥ  r̥bhávo viṣṭy àkrata

translation.text: The R̥ibhus with effectual prayers, honest, with constant labour, made Their Sire and Mother young again.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सं वो॒ मदा॑सो अग्म॒तेन्द्रे॑ण च म॒रुत्व॑ता आ॒दि॒त्येभि॑श्च॒ राज॑भिः
verses.transliteration: sáṃ vo mádāso agmata-  -índreṇa ca marútvatā  ādityébhiś ca rā́jabhiḥ

translation.text: Together came your gladdening drops with Indra by the Maruts girt, With the Âdityas, with the Kings.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त त्यं च॑म॒सं नवं॒ त्वष्टु॑र्दे॒वस्य॒ निष्कृ॑तम् अक॑र्त च॒तुरः॒ पुनः॑
verses.transliteration: utá tyáṃ camasáṃ návaṃ  tváṣṭur devásya níṣkr̥tam  ákarta catúraḥ púnaḥ

translation.text: The sacrificial ladle, wrought newly by the God Tvashṭar's hand- Four ladles have ye made thereof.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ते नो॒ रत्ना॑नि धत्तन॒ त्रिरा साप्ता॑नि सुन्व॒ते एक॑मेकं सुश॒स्तिभिः॑
verses.transliteration: té no rátnāni dhattana  trír ā́ sā́ptāni sunvaté  ékam-ekaṃ suśastíbhiḥ

translation.text: Vouchsafe us wealth, to him who pours thrice seven libations, yea, to each Give wealth, pleased with our eulogies.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अधा॑रयन्त॒ वह्न॒योऽभ॑जन्त सुकृ॒त्यया॑ भा॒गं दे॒वेषु॑ य॒ज्ञिय॑म्
verses.transliteration: ádhārayanta váhnayaḥ-  -ábhajanta sukr̥tyáyā  bhāgáṃ devéṣu yajñíyam

translation.text: As ministering Priests they held, by pious acts they won themselves, A share in sacrifice with Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒हेन्द्रा॒ग्नी उप॑ ह्वये॒ तयो॒रित्स्तोम॑मुश्मसि ता सोमं॑ सोम॒पात॑मा
verses.transliteration: ihéndrāgnī́ úpa hvaye  táyor ít stómam uśmasi  tā́ sómaṃ somapā́tamā

translation.text: INDRA and Agni I invoke fain are we for their song of praise Chief Soma-drinkers are they both.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ता य॒ज्ञेषु॒ प्र शं॑सतेन्द्रा॒ग्नी शु॑म्भता नरः ता गा॑य॒त्रेषु॑ गायत
verses.transliteration: tā́ yajñéṣu prá śaṃsata-  -indrāgnī́ śumbhatā naraḥ  tā́ gāyatréṣu gāyata

translation.text: Praise ye, O men, and glorify Indra-Agni in the holy rites: Sing praise to them in sacred songs.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ता मि॒त्रस्य॒ प्रश॑स्तय इन्द्रा॒ग्नी ता ह॑वामहे सो॒म॒पा सोम॑पीतये
verses.transliteration: tā́ mitrásya práśastaye-  indrāgnī́ tā́ havāmahe  somapā́ sómapītaye

translation.text: Indra and Agni we invite, the Soma-drinkers, for the fame Of Mitra, to the Soma-draught.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒ग्रा सन्ता॑ हवामह॒ उपे॒दं सव॑नं सु॒तम् इ॒न्द्रा॒ग्नी एह ग॑च्छताम्
verses.transliteration: ugrā́ sántā havāmahe-  úpedáṃ sávanaṃ sutám  indrāgnī́ éhá gachatām

translation.text: Strong Gods, we bid them come to this libation that stands ready here: Indra and Agni, come to us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ता म॒हान्ता॒ सद॒स्पती॒ इन्द्रा॑ग्नी॒ रक्ष॑ उब्जतम् अप्र॑जाः सन्त्व॒त्रिणः॑
verses.transliteration: tā́ mahā́ntā sádaspátī  índrāgnī rákṣa ubjatam  áprajāḥ santv atríṇaḥ

translation.text: Indra and Agni, mighty Lords of our assembly, crush the fiends: Childless be the devouring ones.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तेन॑ स॒त्येन॑ जागृत॒मधि॑ प्रचे॒तुने॑ प॒दे इन्द्रा॑ग्नी॒ शर्म॑ यच्छतम्
verses.transliteration: téna satyéna jāgr̥tam  ádhi pracetúne padé  índrāgnī śárma yachatam

translation.text: Watch ye, through this your truthfulness, there in the place of spacious view Indra and Agni, send us bliss.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्रा॒त॒र्युजा॒ वि बो॑धया॒श्विना॒वेह ग॑च्छताम् अ॒स्य सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: prātaryújā ví bodhaya-  -aśvínāv éhá gachatām  asyá sómasya pītáye

translation.text: WAKEN the Aṣvin Pair who yoke their car at early morn: may they Approach to drink this Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: या सु॒रथा॑ र॒थीत॑मो॒भा दे॒वा दि॑वि॒स्पृशा॑ अ॒श्विना॒ ता ह॑वामहे
verses.transliteration: yā́ suráthā rathī́tamā-  -ubhā́ devā́ divispŕ̥śā  aśvínā tā́ havāmahe

translation.text: We call the Aṣvins Twain, the Gods borne in a noble car, the best Of charioteers, who reach the heavens.

verses.sanskrit_deva: या वां॒ कशा॒ मधु॑म॒त्यश्वि॑ना सू॒नृता॑वती तया॑ य॒ज्ञं मि॑मिक्षतम्
verses.transliteration: yā́ vāṃ káśā mádhumatī-  áśvinā sūnŕ̥tāvatī  táyā yajñám mimikṣatam

translation.text: Dropping with honey is your whip, Aṣvins, and full of pleasantness Sprinkle therewith the sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न॒हि वा॒मस्ति॑ दूर॒के यत्रा॒ रथे॑न॒ गच्छ॑थः अश्वि॑ना सो॒मिनो॑ गृ॒हम्
verses.transliteration: nahí vām ásti dūraké  yátrā ráthena gáchathaḥ  áśvinā somíno gr̥hám

translation.text: As ye go thither in your car, not far, O Aṣvins, is the home Of him who offers Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: हिर॑ण्यपाणिमू॒तये॑ सवि॒तार॒मुप॑ ह्वये स चेत्ता॑ दे॒वता॑ प॒दम्
verses.transliteration: híraṇyapāṇim ūtáye  savitā́ram úpa hvaye  sá céttā devátā padám

translation.text: For my protection I invoke the golden-handed Savitar. He knoweth, as a God, the place.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒पां नपा॑त॒मव॑से सवि॒तार॒मुप॑ स्तुहि तस्य॑ व्र॒तान्यु॑श्मसि
verses.transliteration: apā́ṃ nápātam ávase  savitā́ram úpa stuhi  tásya vratā́ny uśmasi

translation.text: That he may send us succour, praise the Waters' Offspring Savitar: Fain are we for his holy ways.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि॒भ॒क्तारं॑ हवामहे॒ वसो॑श्चि॒त्रस्य॒ राध॑सः स॒वि॒तारं॑ नृ॒चक्ष॑सम्
verses.transliteration: vibhaktā́raṃ havāmahe  vásoś citrásya rā́dhasaḥ  savitā́raṃ nr̥cákṣasam

translation.text: We call on him, distributer of wondrous bounty and of wealth, On Savitar who looks on men.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सखा॑य॒ आ नि षी॑दत सवि॒ता स्तोम्यो॒ नु नः॑ दाता॒ राधां॑सि शुम्भति
verses.transliteration: sákhāya ā́ ní ṣīdata  savitā́ stómyo nú naḥ  dā́tā rā́dhāṃsi śumbhati

translation.text: Come hither, friends, and seat yourselves Savitar, to be praised by us, Giving good gifts, is beautiful.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॒ पत्नी॑रि॒हा व॑ह दे॒वाना॑मुश॒तीरुप॑ त्वष्टा॑रं॒ सोम॑पीतये
verses.transliteration: ágne pátnīr ihā́ vaha  devā́nām uśatī́r úpa  tváṣṭāraṃ sómapītaye

translation.text: O Agni, hither bring to us the willing Spouses of the Gods, And Tvashṭar, to the Soma draught.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ ग्ना अ॑ग्न इ॒हाव॑से॒ होत्रां॑ यविष्ठ॒ भार॑तीम् वरू॑त्रीं धि॒षणां॑ वह
verses.transliteration: ā́ gnā́ agna ihā́vase  hótrāṃ yaviṣṭha bhā́ratīm  várūtrīṃ dhiṣáṇāṃ vaha

translation.text: Most youthful Agni, hither bring their Spouses, Hotrâ, Bhâratî, Varûtrî, Dhishaṇâ, for aid.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि नो॑ दे॒वीरव॑सा म॒हः शर्म॑णा नृ॒पत्नीः॑ अच्छि॑न्नपत्राः सचन्ताम्
verses.transliteration: abhí no devī́r ávasā  maháḥ śármaṇā nr̥pátnīḥ  áchinnapatrāḥ sacantām

translation.text: Spouses of Heroes, Goddesses, with whole wings may they come to us With great protection and with aid.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒हेन्द्रा॒णीमुप॑ ह्वये वरुणा॒नीं स्व॒स्तये॑ अ॒ग्नायीं॒ सोम॑पीतये
verses.transliteration: ihéndrāṇī́m úpa hvaye  varuṇānī́ṃ svastáye  agnā́yīṃ sómapītaye

translation.text: Indrâṇî, Varuṇânî, and Agnayi hither I invite, For weal, to drink the Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒ही द्यौः पृ॑थि॒वी च॑ न इ॒मं य॒ज्ञं मि॑मिक्षताम् पि॒पृ॒तां नो॒ भरी॑मभिः
verses.transliteration: mahī́ dyaúḥ pr̥thivī́ ca naḥ-  imáṃ yajñám mimikṣatām  pipr̥tā́ṃ no bhárīmabhiḥ

translation.text: May Heaven and Earth, the Mighty Pair, bedew for us our sacrifice, And feed us full with nourishments.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तयो॒रिद्घृ॒तव॒त्पयो॒ विप्रा॑ रिहन्ति धी॒तिभिः॑ ग॒न्ध॒र्वस्य॑ ध्रु॒वे प॒दे
verses.transliteration: táyor íd ghr̥távat páyo  víprā rihanti dhītíbhiḥ  gandharvásya dhruvé padé

translation.text: Their water rich with fatness, there in the Gandharva's steadfast place, The singers taste through sacred songs.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स्यो॒ना पृ॑थिवि भवानृक्ष॒रा नि॒वेश॑नी यच्छा॑ नः॒ शर्म॑ स॒प्रथः॑
verses.transliteration: syonā́ pr̥thivi bhava-  -anr̥kṣarā́ nivéśanī  yáchā naḥ śárma sapráthaḥ

translation.text: Thornless be thou, O Earth, spread wide before us for a dwelling-place: Vouchsafe us shelter broad and sure.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अतो॑ दे॒वा अ॑वन्तु नो॒ यतो॒ विष्णु॑र्विचक्र॒मे पृ॒थि॒व्याः स॒प्त धाम॑भिः
verses.transliteration: áto devā́ avantu no  yáto víṣṇur vicakramé  pr̥thivyā́ḥ saptá dhā́mabhiḥ

translation.text: The Gods be gracious unto us even from the place whence Vishṇu strode Through the seven regions of the earth!

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒दं विष्णु॒र्वि च॑क्रमे त्रे॒धा नि द॑धे प॒दम् समू॑ळ्हमस्य पांसु॒रे
verses.transliteration: idáṃ víṣṇur ví cakrame  tredhā́ ní dadhe padám  sámūḷham asya pāṃsuré

translation.text: Through all this world strode Vishṇu; thrice his foot he planted, and the whole Was gathered in his footstep's dust.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्रीणि॑ प॒दा वि च॑क्रमे॒ विष्णु॑र्गो॒पा अदा॑भ्यः अतो॒ धर्मा॑णि धा॒रय॑न्
verses.transliteration: trī́ṇi padā́ ví cakrame  víṣṇur gopā́ ádābhyaḥ  áto dhármāṇi dhāráyan

translation.text: Vishṇu, the Guardian, he whom none deceiveth, made three steps; thenceforth Establishing his high decrees.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विष्णोः॒ कर्मा॑णि पश्यत॒ यतो॑ व्र॒तानि॑ पस्प॒शे इन्द्र॑स्य॒ युज्यः॒ सखा॑
verses.transliteration: víṣṇoḥ kármāṇi paśyata  yáto vratā́ni paspaśé  índrasya yújyaḥ sákhā

translation.text: Look ye on Vishṇu's works, whereby the Friend of Indra, close-allied, Hath let his holy ways be seen.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तद्विष्णोः॑ पर॒मं प॒दं सदा॑ पश्यन्ति सू॒रयः॑ दि॒वी॑व॒ चक्षु॒रात॑तम्
verses.transliteration: tád víṣṇoḥ paramám padáṃ  sádā paśyanti sūráyaḥ  divī̀va cákṣur ā́tatam

translation.text: The princes evermore behold that loftiest place where Vishṇu is, Laid as it were an eye in heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तद्विप्रा॑सो विप॒न्यवो॑ जागृ॒वांसः॒ समि॑न्धते विष्णो॒र्यत्प॑र॒मं प॒दम्
verses.transliteration: tád víprāso vipanyávo  jāgr̥vā́ṃsaḥ sám indhate  víṣṇor yát paramám padám

translation.text: This, Vishṇu's station most sublime, the singers, ever vigilant, Lovers of holy song, light up.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ती॒व्राः सोमा॑स॒ आ ग॑ह्या॒शीर्व॑न्तः सु॒ता इ॒मे वायो॒ तान्प्रस्थि॑तान्पिब
verses.transliteration: tīvrā́ḥ sómāsa ā́ gahi-  āśī́rvantaḥ sutā́ imé  vā́yo tā́n prásthitān piba

translation.text: STRONG are the Somas; come thou nigh; these juices have been mixt with milk: Drink, Vâyu, the presented draughts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒भा दे॒वा दि॑वि॒स्पृशे॑न्द्रवा॒यू ह॑वामहे अ॒स्य सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: -ubhā́ devā́ divispŕ̥śā  -indravāyū́ havāmahe  asyá sómasya pītáye

translation.text: Both Deities who touch the heaven, Indra and Vâyu we invoke To drink of this our soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒न्द्र॒वा॒यू म॑नो॒जुवा॒ विप्रा॑ हवन्त ऊ॒तये॑ स॒ह॒स्रा॒क्षा धि॒यस्पती॑
verses.transliteration: indravāyū́ manojúvā  víprā havanta ūtáye  sahasrākṣā́ dhiyás pátī

translation.text: The singers' for their aid, invoke Indra and Vâyu, swift as mind, The thousand-eyed, the Lords of thought.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मि॒त्रं व॒यं ह॑वामहे॒ वरु॑णं॒ सोम॑पीतये ज॒ज्ञा॒ना पू॒तद॑क्षसा
verses.transliteration: mitráṃ vayáṃ havāmahe  váruṇaṃ sómapītaye  jajñānā́ pūtádakṣasā

translation.text: Mitra and Varuṇa, renowned as Gods of consecrated might, We call to drink the Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऋ॒तेन॒ यावृ॑ता॒वृधा॑वृ॒तस्य॒ ज्योति॑ष॒स्पती॑ ता मि॒त्रावरु॑णा हुवे
verses.transliteration: r̥téna yā́v r̥tāvŕ̥dhāv  r̥tásya jyótiṣas pátī  tā́ mitrā́váruṇā huve

translation.text: Those who by Law uphold the Law, Lords of the shining light of Law, Mitra I call, and Varuṇa.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वरु॑णः प्रावि॒ता भु॑वन्मि॒त्रो विश्वा॑भिरू॒तिभिः॑ कर॑तां नः सु॒राध॑सः
verses.transliteration: váruṇaḥ prāvitā́ bhuvat-  mitró víśvābhir ūtíbhiḥ  káratāṃ naḥ surā́dhasaḥ

translation.text: Let Varuṇa be our chief defence, let Mitra guard us with all aids Both make us rich exceedingly.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒रुत्व॑न्तं हवामह॒ इन्द्र॒मा सोम॑पीतये स॒जूर्ग॒णेन॑ तृम्पतु
verses.transliteration: marútvantaṃ havāmahe-  índram ā́ sómapītaye  sajū́r gaṇéna tr̥mpatu

translation.text: Indra, by Maruts girt, we call to drink the Soma juice: may he Sate him in union with his troop.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॑ज्येष्ठा॒ मरु॑द्गणा॒ देवा॑सः॒ पूष॑रातयः विश्वे॒ मम॑ श्रुता॒ हव॑म्
verses.transliteration: índrajyeṣṭhā márudgaṇāḥ-  dévāsaḥ pū́ṣarātayaḥ  víśve máma śrutā hávam

translation.text: Gods, Marut hosts whom Indra leads, distributers of Pûshan's gifts, Hearken ye all unto my cry.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ह॒त वृ॒त्रं सु॑दानव॒ इन्द्रे॑ण॒ सह॑सा यु॒जा मा नो॑ दुः॒शंस॑ ईशत
verses.transliteration: hatá vr̥tráṃ sudānavaḥ-  índreṇa sáhasā yujā́  mā́ no duḥśáṃsa īśata

translation.text: With conquering Indra for ally, strike Vr̥itra down, ye bounteous Gods Let not the wicked master us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वा॑न्दे॒वान्ह॑वामहे म॒रुतः॒ सोम॑पीतये उ॒ग्रा हि पृश्नि॑मातरः
verses.transliteration: víśvān devā́n havāmahe  marútaḥ sómapītaye  ugrā́ hí pŕ̥śnimātaraḥ

translation.text: We call the Universal Gods, and Maruts to the Soma draught, For passing strong are Pr̥iṣni's Sons.

verses.sanskrit_deva: जय॑तामिव तन्य॒तुर्म॒रुता॑मेति धृष्णु॒या यच्छुभं॑ या॒थना॑ नरः
verses.transliteration: jáyatām iva tanyatúr  marútām eti dhr̥ṣṇuyā́  yác chúbhaṃ yāthánā naraḥ

translation.text: Fierce comes the Maruts' thundering voice, like that of conquerors, when ye go Forward to victory, O Men.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ह॒स्का॒राद्वि॒द्युत॒स्पर्यतो॑ जा॒ता अ॑वन्तु नः म॒रुतो॑ मृळयन्तु नः
verses.transliteration: haskārā́d vidyútas pári-  áto jātā́ avantu naḥ  marúto mr̥ḷayantu naḥ

translation.text: Born of the laughing lightning. may the Maruts guard us everywhere May they be gracious unto Us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ पू॑षञ्चि॒त्रब॑र्हिष॒माघृ॑णे ध॒रुणं॑ दि॒वः आजा॑ न॒ष्टं यथा॑ प॒शुम्
verses.transliteration: ā́ pūṣañ citrábarhiṣam  ā́ghr̥ṇe dharúṇaṃ diváḥ  ā́jā naṣṭáṃ yáthā paśúm

translation.text: Like some lost animal, drive to us, bright Pûshan, him who bears up heaven, Resting on many-coloured grass.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पू॒षा राजा॑न॒माघृ॑णि॒रप॑गूळ्हं॒ गुहा॑ हि॒तम् अवि॑न्दच्चि॒त्रब॑र्हिषम्
verses.transliteration: pūṣā́ rā́jānam ā́ghr̥ṇir  ápagūḷhaṃ gúhā hitám  ávindac citrábarhiṣam

translation.text: Pûshan the Bright has found the King, concealed and bidden in a cave, Who rests on grass of many hues.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒तो स मह्य॒मिन्दु॑भिः॒ षड्यु॒क्ताँ अ॑नु॒सेषि॑धत् गोभि॒र्यवं॒ न च॑र्कृषत्
verses.transliteration: utó sá máhyam índubhiḥ  ṣáḍ yuktā́m̐ anuséṣidhat  góbhir yávaṃ ná carkr̥ṣat

translation.text: And may he. duly bring to me the six bound closely, through these drops, As one who ploughs with steers brings corn.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒म्बयो॑ य॒न्त्यध्व॑भिर्जा॒मयो॑ अध्वरीय॒ताम् पृ॒ञ्च॒तीर्मधु॑ना॒ पयः॑
verses.transliteration: ambáyo yanty ádhvabhir  jāmáyo adhvarīyatā́m  pr̥ñcatī́r mádhunā páyaḥ

translation.text: Along their paths the Mothers go, Sisters of priestly ministrants, Mingling their sweetness with the milk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒मूर्या उप॒ सूर्ये॒ याभि॑र्वा॒ सूर्यः॑ स॒ह ता नो॑ हिन्वन्त्वध्व॒रम्
verses.transliteration: amū́r yā́ úpa sū́rye  yā́bhir vā sū́ryaḥ sahá  tā́ no hinvantv adhvarám

translation.text: May Waters gathered near the Sun, and those wherewith the Sun is joined, Speed forth this sacrifice of ours.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒पो दे॒वीरुप॑ ह्वये॒ यत्र॒ गावः॒ पिब॑न्ति नः सिन्धु॑भ्यः॒ कर्त्वं॑ ह॒विः
verses.transliteration: apó devī́r úpa hvaye  yátra gā́vaḥ píbanti naḥ  síndhubhyaḥ kártvaṃ havíḥ

translation.text: I call the Waters, Goddesses, wherein our cattle quench their thirst; Oblations to the Streams be given.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒प्स्व१॒॑न्तर॒मृत॑म॒प्सु भे॑ष॒जम॒पामु॒त प्रश॑स्तये देवा॒ भव॑त वा॒जिनः॑
verses.transliteration: apsv àntár amŕ̥tam apsú bheṣajám  apā́m utá práśastaye  dévā bhávata vājínaḥ

translation.text: Amrit is in the Waters in the Waters there is healing balm Be swift, ye Gods, to give them praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒प्सु मे॒ सोमो॑ अब्रवीद॒न्तर्विश्वा॑नि भेष॒जा अ॒ग्निं च॑ वि॒श्वश॑म्भुव॒माप॑श्च वि॒श्वभे॑षजीः
verses.transliteration: apsú me sómo abravīd  antár víśvāni bheṣajā́  agníṃ ca viśváśambhuvam  ā́paś ca viśvábheṣajīḥ

translation.text: Within the Waters-Soma thus hath told me-dwell all balms that heal, And Agni, he who blesseth all. The Waters hold all medicines.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आपः॑ पृणी॒त भे॑ष॒जं वरू॑थं त॒न्वे॒३॒॑ मम॑ ज्योक्च॒ सूर्यं॑ दृ॒शे
verses.transliteration: ā́paḥ pr̥ṇītá bheṣajáṃ  várūthaṃ tanvè máma  jyók ca sū́ryaṃ dr̥śé

translation.text: O Waters, teem with medicine to keep my body safe from harm, So that I long may see the Sun.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒दमा॑पः॒ प्र व॑हत॒ यत्किं च॑ दुरि॒तं मयि॑ यद्वा॒हम॑भिदु॒द्रोह॒ यद्वा॑ शे॒प उ॒तानृ॑तम्
verses.transliteration: idám āpaḥ prá vahata  yát kíṃ ca duritám máyi  yád vāhám abhidudróha  yád vā śepá utā́nr̥tam

translation.text: Whatever sin is found in me, whatever evil I have wrought. If I have lied or falsely sworn, Waters, remove it far from me.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आपो॑ अ॒द्यान्व॑चारिषं॒ रसे॑न॒ सम॑गस्महि पय॑स्वानग्न॒ आ ग॑हि॒ तं मा॒ सं सृ॑ज॒ वर्च॑सा
verses.transliteration: ā́po adyā́nv acāriṣaṃ  rásena sám agasmahi  páyasvān agna ā́ gahi  tám mā sáṃ sr̥ja várcasā

translation.text: The Waters I this day have sought, and to their moisture have we come: O Agni, rich in milk, come thou, and with thy splendour cover me.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सं मा॑ग्ने॒ वर्च॑सा सृज॒ सं प्र॒जया॒ समायु॑षा वि॒द्युर्मे॑ अस्य दे॒वा इन्द्रो॑ विद्यात्स॒ह ऋषि॑भिः
verses.transliteration: sám māgne várcasā sr̥ja  sám prajáyā sám ā́yuṣā  vidyúr me asya devā́ḥ-  índro vidyāt sahá ŕ̥ṣibhiḥ

translation.text: Fill me with splendour, Agni; give offspring and length of days; the Gods Shall know me even as I am, and Indra with the R̥ishis, know.

verses.sanskrit_deva: कस्य॑ नू॒नं क॑त॒मस्या॒मृता॑नां॒ मना॑महे॒ चारु॑ दे॒वस्य॒ नाम॑ को नो॑ म॒ह्या अदि॑तये॒ पुन॑र्दात्पि॒तरं॑ च दृ॒शेयं॑ मा॒तरं॑ च
verses.transliteration: kásya nūnáṃ katamásyāmŕ̥tānām  mánāmahe cā́ru devásya nā́ma  kó no mahyā́ áditaye púnar dāt  pitáraṃ ca dr̥śéyam mātáraṃ ca

translation.text: WHO now is he, what God among Immortals, of whose auspicious name we may bethink us? Who shall to mighty Aditi restore us, that I may see my Father and my Mother?

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्नेर्व॒यं प्र॑थ॒मस्या॒मृता॑नां॒ मना॑महे॒ चारु॑ दे॒वस्य॒ नाम॑ स नो॑ म॒ह्या अदि॑तये॒ पुन॑र्दात्पि॒तरं॑ च दृ॒शेयं॑ मा॒तरं॑ च
verses.transliteration: agnér vayám prathamásyāmŕ̥tānām  mánāmahe cā́ru devásya nā́ma  sá no mahyā́ áditaye púnar dāt  pitáraṃ ca dr̥śéyam mātáraṃ ca

translation.text: Agni the God the first among the Immortals, – of his auspicious name let us bethink us. He shall to mighty Aditi restore us, that I may see my Father and my Mother.
